sql:
SELECT 
    a.suserid,
    a.sgamecode,
    SUM(a.ionlinetime) AS ionlinetime
FROM dws_mgamejp_login_user_activity_di a
INNER JOIN dim_vplayerid_vies_df b
    ON a.suserid = b.suserid
WHERE a.dtstatdate BETWEEN 20250530 AND 20250724
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250724'
    AND b.itag = '其他'
    AND a.sgamecode IN ('initiatived', 'jordass', 'esports', 'allianceforce', 'strategy', 'playzone', 'su')
    AND a.saccounttype = '-100'
    AND a.suseridtype IN ('qq', 'wxid')
    AND a.splattype = '-100'
    AND a.splat = '-100'
GROUP BY a.suserid, a.sgamecode

SELECT DISTINCT
    vplayerid AS gplayerid
FROM dws_argothek_ce1_cbt2_vplayerid_suserid_di
WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250717' AND '20250723'
  AND vplayerid NOT IN (
      SELECT vplayerid 
      FROM dim_extract_311381_conf
  )

SELECT DISTINCT 
    dim.iuserid AS gplayerid
FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di AS oss
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df AS dim
    ON oss.iuserid = dim.iuserid
    AND dim.dtstatdate = '20250131'
    AND dim.vGameAppid = 'initiatived'
INNER JOIN dws_mgamejp_login_user_activity_di AS mgame
    ON dim.suserid = mgame.suserid
    AND mgame.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250101' AND '20250131'
    AND mgame.sgamecode = 'esports'
    AND mgame.saccounttype = '-100'
    AND mgame.suseridtype IN ('qq', 'wxid')
    AND mgame.splattype IN ('-100', 'PC')
    AND mgame.splat = '-100'
WHERE oss.statis_date BETWEEN '20250101' AND '20250131'

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(vrolename, '#') > 0 
        THEN SUBSTR(vrolename, 1, INSTR(vrolename, '#') - 1) 
        ELSE vrolename 
    END AS nickname,
    COUNT(DISTINCT iuserid) AS user_count
FROM dwd_argothek_playerlogin_hi
WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250715'
    AND vrolename IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(vrolename, '#') > 0 
        THEN SUBSTR(vrolename, 1, INSTR(vrolename, '#') - 1) 
        ELSE vrolename 
    END
ORDER BY user_count DESC;

SELECT DISTINCT 
    a.vplayerid
FROM 
    dws_argothek_ce1_cbt2_vplayerid_suserid_di AS a
INNER JOIN 
    dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df AS b
    ON a.suserid = b.suserid
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250612' AND '20250714'
    AND a.itag = 'T2'
    AND b.iregdate < '20250529'

SELECT 
    dtstatdate,
    iregway AS reg_channel,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS new_user_cnt
FROM 
    dws_argothek_ce1_cbt2_vplayerid_suserid_di
WHERE 
    dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250703' AND '20250706'
    AND is_reg = '1'
    AND iregway IN (
        '89903934', '89903933', '89903932', 
        '89902725', '89902724', '89902723', 
        '89900960', '89900961', '89900962'
    )
    AND sourcename NOT IN ('内部体验', '买量测试')
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate,
    iregway
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate,
    iregway;

SELECT 
    DATE_FORMAT(`dteventtime`, '%Y-%m') AS `month`,
    `gamepodid` AS `server_node`,
    MAX(`dteventtime`) AS `peak_time`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `matchid`) AS `total_completed_matches`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `queueid` = 'competitive' THEN `matchid` END) AS `competitive_matches`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `queueid` = 'unrated' THEN `matchid` END) AS `unrated_matches`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `queueid` = 'swiftplay' THEN `matchid` END) AS `swiftplay_matches`
FROM 
    `dwd_argothek_matchdetails_hi`
WHERE 
    `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20250401' AND '20250630'
    AND LOWER(`completionstate`) IN ('completed', 'surrendered')
GROUP BY 
    DATE_FORMAT(`dteventtime`, '%Y-%m'),
    `gamepodid`
ORDER BY 
    `month`,
    `gamepodid`;

SELECT 
    u.city_level AS 城市等级,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.suserid) AS 用户人数
FROM 
    dim_mgamejp_account_allinfo_nf AS a
INNER JOIN 
    dim_uf_player_gameinfo_mf AS u
    ON a.suserid = u.userid 
    AND a.suseridtype = u.id_type
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate = '20250702'
    AND a.saccounttype = '-100'
    AND a.suseridtype IN ('qq', 'wxid')
    AND a.sgamecode IN ('esports', 'mobile_live', 'initiatived', 'allianceforce', 'strategy', 'jordass', 'su', 'playzone', 'battlezone', 'battlearena', 'weapon', 'playhub', 'manager', 'apgame')
    AND a.splattype = '-100'
    AND a.ilastactdate >= '20250104'
    AND u.kp_imp_date = '202506'
GROUP BY 
    u.city_level
ORDER BY 
    用户人数 DESC;

SELECT 
    a.expressionassetid AS item_id,
    c.seasonidname AS season_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN a.expressionassetid IS NOT NULL 
        THEN CONCAT(a.tdbank_imp_date, '_', a.expressionassetid) 
    END) AS current_season_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT b.purchasedItemId) AS current_season_buyers
FROM 
    dwd_argothek_playerloadout_expressions_hi a
INNER JOIN 
    dim_argothek_seasondate_df c
    ON a.tdbank_imp_date = c.idate
LEFT JOIN 
    dwd_argothek_commercialization_gearid_df b
    ON a.expressionassetid = b.purchasedItemId
    AND b.idate = c.idate
    AND b.purchaseSource = 'BATTLEPASS_PROGRESS'
    AND b.itemtype = 'd5f120f8-ff8c-4aac-92ea-f2b5acbe9475'
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250615'
WHERE 
    a.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250615'
    AND c.idate BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250615'
    AND a.expressionassetid IS NOT NULL
    AND a.expressiontypeid = 'd5f120f8-ff8c-4aac-92ea-f2b5acbe9475'
GROUP BY 
    a.expressionassetid,
    c.seasonidname
ORDER BY 
    c.seasonidname, 
    a.expressionassetid;

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.iuserid) AS active_users_30d,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.gear_count = 11 THEN a.iuserid END) AS active_users_with_all_goods_30d
FROM (
    SELECT 
        iuserid
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_useractivity_df
    WHERE statis_date = 20250617
      AND iworldid = 255
      AND instr(substr(iactivity, 1, 30), '1') > 0
) a
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        iuserid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT iGoodsId) AS gear_count
    FROM dwd_argothek_gearrecord_df
    WHERE dtstatdate = '20250617'
      AND iGoodsId IN (
          '71d260ca-4bad-81f2-0298-44860341a7a6',
          '48601754-442d-98cb-2109-3fb2075500ec',
          'a9126263-439c-7be6-d668-52a6c0c0a36f',
          '34ecc788-4034-71d2-a0ac-c398b8ecb2ae',
          '56f98991-43f8-dcc8-189e-08b7ae6c42ad',
          '8453f8ef-4c0b-46e2-8768-3e9e45c67a2c',
          '06d90274-435f-3e32-9d57-26bc228ae2e5',
          '8196dea4-4229-c951-13a9-088fb13b3512',
          '3abc330f-444a-6dfd-5863-81856ba62624',
          '041a43a4-46fe-dab7-c974-36bf91eab33d',
          '5b863cb9-4e41-ec89-69ee-49a223d05ff1'
      )
      AND iCount > 0
    GROUP BY iuserid
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT iGoodsId) = 11
) b ON a.iuserid = b.iuserid;

SELECT DISTINCT
    w.swxid
FROM (
    SELECT 
        l.iuserid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT l.statis_date) AS active_days,
        MAX(l.statis_date) AS last_active_date
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di l
    WHERE l.statis_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250612'
    GROUP BY l.iuserid
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT l.statis_date) >= 30
        AND MAX(l.statis_date) < '20250312'
) a
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        iuserid,
        SUM(ftranamt) AS total_pay
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_portaltransaction_di
    WHERE statis_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250612'
        AND vusertype IN ('qq', 'wx')
    GROUP BY iuserid
) p ON a.iuserid = p.iuserid
INNER JOIN dim_mgamejp_tbplayerid2qq_nf q ON a.iuserid = q.iqq
INNER JOIN dim_mgamejp_idconversion_wxid_qq_nf w ON q.iqq = w.iqq
WHERE p.total_pay IS NULL OR p.total_pay / 100 <= 1500;

SELECT DISTINCT
    d.suserid
FROM (
    -- 5月活跃用户集合
    SELECT DISTINCT iuserid
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di
    WHERE statis_date BETWEEN '20250501' AND '20250531'
) AS may_active
LEFT ANTI JOIN (
    -- 6月活跃用户集合
    SELECT DISTINCT iuserid
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di
    WHERE statis_date BETWEEN '20250601' AND '20250630'
) AS june_active
ON may_active.iuserid = june_active.iuserid
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df AS d
ON may_active.iuserid = d.iuserid
WHERE d.dtstatdate = '20250610'

SELECT DISTINCT 
    a.iuserid AS gplayerid
FROM dws_argothek_oss_useractivity_df a
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df b
    ON a.iuserid = b.iuserid
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250608'
INNER JOIN dws_mgamejp_login_user_activity_di c
    ON b.suserid = c.suserid
    AND c.dtstatdate = '20250608'
    AND c.sgamecode = 'esports'
    AND c.itimes >= 1
    AND c.saccounttype = '-100'
    AND c.suseridtype IN ('qq', 'wxid')
    AND c.splattype = 'PC'
    AND c.splat = '-100'
WHERE a.statis_date = '20250531'
    AND a.iworldid = 'initiatived'
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(REVERSE(RPAD(a.iactivity, 128, '0')), 1, 31), '1') = 0
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(REVERSE(RPAD(a.iactivity, 128, '0')), 32, 31), '1') > 0

SELECT 
    tdbank_imp_date AS date,
    tier_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') THEN matchid END) AS non_surrender_matches,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) IN ('surrendered') THEN matchid END) AS surrender_matches,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') AND ABS(roundswon - (roundsplayed - roundswon)) >= 6 THEN matchid END) AS roundsdiff_gte6,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') AND ABS(roundswon - (roundsplayed - roundswon)) >= 8 THEN matchid END) AS roundsdiff_gte8
FROM (
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        matchid,
        completionstate,
        roundswon,
        roundsplayed,
        CASE 
            WHEN competitivetier IN (3, 4, 5) THEN '黑铁'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (6, 7, 8) THEN '黄铜'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (9, 10, 11) THEN '白银'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (12, 13, 14) THEN '黄金'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (15, 16, 17) THEN '白金'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (18, 19, 20) THEN '钻石'
            WHEN competitivetier IN (21, 22, 23) THEN '超凡'
            WHEN competitivetier >= 24 THEN '神话及以上'
            ELSE '无段位'
        END AS tier_name
    FROM dwd_argothek_playermatchstats_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250531'
        AND queueid = 'competitive'
) t1
GROUP BY tdbank_imp_date, tier_name

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    tdbank_imp_date AS date,
    '全量段位' AS tier_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') THEN matchid END) AS non_surrender_matches,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) IN ('surrendered') THEN matchid END) AS surrender_matches,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') AND ABS(roundswon - (roundsplayed - roundswon)) >= 6 THEN matchid END) AS roundsdiff_gte6,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN LOWER(completionstate) NOT IN ('surrendered') AND ABS(roundswon - (roundsplayed - roundswon)) >= 8 THEN matchid END) AS roundsdiff_gte8
FROM dwd_argothek_playermatchstats_hi
WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20250531'
    AND queueid = 'competitive'
GROUP BY tdbank_imp_date

ORDER BY date, tier_name;

SELECT 
    `statis_date` AS `date`,
    `iloginway` AS `channel`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `iuserid`) AS `active_users`
FROM 
    `dws_argothek_oss_login_di`
WHERE 
    `statis_date` BETWEEN '20250506' AND '20250512'
    AND `iloginway` IN (1, 10, 11, 12, 35, 20, 28, 29, 30, 31, 32, 33, 34, 36)
GROUP BY 
    `statis_date`,
    `iloginway`
ORDER BY 
    `statis_date`,
    `iloginway`;

WITH active_users AS (
    -- 获取2024年5月2日的日活跃用户
    SELECT DISTINCT iuserid
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di
    WHERE statis_date = '20240502'
),
user_gameplay AS (
    -- 获取活跃用户在7天内的玩法行为
    SELECT 
        a.iuserid,
        m.queueid
    FROM active_users a
    INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid_vroleid_df d
        ON a.iuserid = d.iuserid
        AND d.dtstatdate = '20240502'
        AND d.iareaid = '101'
    INNER JOIN dwd_argothek_playermatchstats_hi m
        ON d.vroleid = m.vroleid
        AND m.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20240426' AND '20240502'
        AND m.ismatchcompleted = 1
    GROUP BY a.iuserid, m.queueid
),
user_mode_summary AS (
    -- 统计每个用户玩的模式类型
    SELECT 
        iuserid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT queueid) AS mode_count,
        SUM(CASE WHEN queueid IN ('QuickMatch', 'RushMode', 'CombatArena') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS leisure_mode_count,
        SUM(CASE WHEN queueid NOT IN ('QuickMatch', 'RushMode', 'CombatArena') THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS other_mode_count,
        MAX(CASE WHEN queueid = 'QuickMatch' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_quickmatch,
        MAX(CASE WHEN queueid = 'RushMode' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_rushmode,
        MAX(CASE WHEN queueid = 'CombatArena' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_combatarena
    FROM user_gameplay
    GROUP BY iuserid
),
weekly_activity AS (
    -- 计算周活跃频次
    SELECT 
        a.iuserid,
        LENGTH(REPLACE(SUBSTR(d.cbitmap, 1, 7), '0', '')) AS weekly_active_days
    FROM active_users a
    INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid_vroleid_df d
        ON a.iuserid = d.iuserid
        AND d.dtstatdate = '20240502'
        AND d.iareaid = '101'
)
SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN u.mode_count = 1 AND u.has_quickmatch = 1 THEN u.iuserid END) AS only_quickmatch_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN u.mode_count = 1 AND u.has_rushmode = 1 THEN u.iuserid END) AS only_rushmode_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN u.mode_count = 1 AND u.has_combatarena = 1 THEN u.iuserid END) AS only_combatarena_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN u.leisure_mode_count > 0 AND u.other_mode_count = 0 THEN u.iuserid END) AS only_three_modes_users,
    AVG(CASE WHEN u.leisure_mode_count > 0 AND u.other_mode_count = 0 THEN w.weekly_active_days END) AS avg_weekly_active_frequency
FROM user_mode_summary u
LEFT JOIN weekly_activity w
    ON u.iuserid = w.iuserid;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(logout.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 6) AS month,
    -- 人均对局时长（小时）
    ROUND(SUM(match.gamelengthmillis) / COUNT(DISTINCT logout.iuserid) / 3600000, 2) AS avg_match_duration_hours,
    -- 网吧时间占当月游戏时间比例
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN logout.inetbarlevel = '2' THEN logout.ionlinetime ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / 
          NULLIF(SUM(logout.ionlinetime), 0), 4) AS netbar_time_ratio,
    -- 有对局的天数（按用户统计平均值）
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CONCAT(logout.iuserid, '_', logout.tdbank_imp_date)) * 1.0 / 
          COUNT(DISTINCT logout.iuserid), 1) AS avg_match_days,
    -- 排位模式时长（小时）
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN match.queueid = 'competitive' THEN match.gamelengthmillis ELSE 0 END) / 3600000, 2) AS competitive_duration_hours,
    -- 排位模式组队率
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN match.queueid = 'competitive' AND match.partyid IS NOT NULL THEN match.matchid END) * 1.0 / 
          NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN match.queueid = 'competitive' THEN match.matchid END), 0), 4) AS competitive_party_rate,
    -- 月付费率
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT pay.iuserid) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT logout.iuserid), 4) AS monthly_payment_rate,
    -- 月ARPA
    ROUND(SUM(pay.ftranamt) / 100.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT logout.iuserid), 2) AS monthly_arpa,
    -- 月ARPPU
    ROUND(SUM(pay.ftranamt) / 100.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT pay.iuserid), 0), 2) AS monthly_arppu,
    -- 高校特权激活率
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN logout.icampuslevel > '0' THEN logout.iuserid END) * 1.0 / 
          COUNT(DISTINCT logout.iuserid), 4) AS campus_activation_rate
FROM 
    dwd_argothek_playerlogout_hi AS logout
LEFT JOIN 
    dwd_argothek_playermatchstats_hi AS match
    ON logout.vroleid = match.vroleid
    AND match.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240430'
LEFT JOIN 
    dws_argothek_oss_portaltransaction_di AS pay
    ON logout.iuserid = pay.iuserid
    AND pay.statis_date BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240430'
WHERE 
    logout.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240430'
    AND logout.inetbarlevel = '2'
GROUP BY 
    SUBSTR(logout.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 6)
ORDER BY 
    month;

SELECT DISTINCT
    b.suserid AS QQ
FROM (
    SELECT 
        iuserid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT statis_date) AS login_days
    FROM dws_argothek_oss_login_di
    WHERE statis_date BETWEEN '20250330' AND '20250428'
        AND iloginway = 3
    GROUP BY iuserid
    HAVING COUNT(DISTINCT statis_date) BETWEEN 5 AND 8
) a
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df b
    ON a.iuserid = b.iuserid
WHERE b.dtstatdate = '20250428'
    AND b.swxid_type = 'qq'
    AND a.login_days = 8

SELECT DISTINCT
    d.suserid AS qq
FROM dwd_argothek_playermatchstats_hi a
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid_vroleid_df b
    ON a.vroleid = b.vRoleID
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250330'
INNER JOIN dws_argothek_oss_login_di c
    ON b.iuserid = c.iuserid
    AND c.statis_date BETWEEN '20250324' AND '20250330'
    AND c.iloginway = 3
INNER JOIN dim_argothek_gplayerid2qqwxid_df d
    ON b.iuserid = d.iuserid
    AND d.dtstatdate = '20250330'
    AND d.swxid_type = 'qq'
WHERE a.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20250324' AND '20250330'

WITH hero_picks AS (
    -- 英雄1（2个characterid）
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20230726' AND '20230801'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` IN ('e370fa57-4757-3604-3648-499e1f642d3f', 'cc8b64c8-4b25-4ff9-6e7f-37b4da43d235')
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 英雄2
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20231101' AND '20231107'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` = '0e38b510-41a8-5780-5e8f-568b2a4f2d6c'
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 英雄3
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20240327' AND '20240402'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` = '1dbf2edd-4729-0984-3115-daa5eed44993'
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 英雄4
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20240829' AND '20240904'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` = 'efba5359-4016-a1e5-7626-b1ae76895940'
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 英雄5
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20250109' AND '20250115'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` = 'b444168c-4e35-8076-db47-ef9bf368f384'
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 英雄6
    SELECT 
        `characterid`,
        `subject`,
        COUNT(*) AS pick_count
    FROM `dwd_argothek_playermatchdetail_hi`
    WHERE `tdbank_imp_date` BETWEEN '20250306' AND '20250312'
        AND `provisioningflowid` = 'Matchmaking'
        AND `characterid` = 'df1cb487-4902-002e-5c17-d28e83e78588'
    GROUP BY `characterid`, `subject`
)

SELECT 
    `characterid` AS hero_id,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `pick_count` > 3 THEN `subject` END) AS players_over_3,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `pick_count` > 10 THEN `subject` END) AS players_over_10,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `subject`) AS total_players,
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `pick_count` > 3 THEN `subject` END) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT `subject`), 4) AS ratio_over_3,
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN `pick_count` > 10 THEN `subject` END) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT `subject`), 4) AS ratio_over_10
FROM hero_picks
GROUP BY `characterid`
ORDER BY `characterid`;

SELECT 
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.tag = 'EnemiesBlinded' THEN a.amount ELSE 0 END) AS enemies_blinded_count,
    SUM(CASE WHEN a.tag = 'AlliesBlinded' THEN a.amount ELSE 0 END) AS allies_blinded_count
FROM 
    dwd_argothek_abilityinfo_effects_hi a
INNER JOIN 
    dwd_argothek_matchdetails_hi m
    ON a.matchinfomatchid = m.matchid
WHERE 
    a.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20241216'
    AND m.provisioningflowid = 'Matchmaking'
    AND a.tag IN ('EnemiesBlinded', 'AlliesBlinded');

SELECT 
    COUNT(1) AS weapon_代买次数
FROM 
    dwd_argothek_apinventorymovementlog_hi AS t1
INNER JOIN 
    dwd_argothek_matchdetails_hi AS t2
ON 
    t1.matchinfomatchid = t2.matchid
WHERE 
    t1.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20241216'
    AND t1.transactiontype = 'FulfillRequest'
    AND t2.provisioningflowid = 'Matchmaking'

WITH daily_mode_stats AS (
  -- 每日每个玩法的参与用户数和人均对局数
  SELECT 
    dtstatdate,
    CASE 
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND mapname = '群屿' THEN '主题群屿'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '群屿' THEN '传统群屿'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '假日群岛' THEN '假日群岛'
      WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '荣耀之城' THEN '荣耀之城'
      WHEN submodename = '广域战场模式' THEN '广域战场'
      WHEN submodename = '极能形态模式' THEN '极能形态'
      WHEN modename = '组队竞技' THEN '组竞'
      WHEN modename = '休闲模式' THEN '休闲'
      WHEN modename = '乐园' THEN '乐园'
      WHEN modename = '领地' THEN '领地'
      WHEN modename = '广阔天地' THEN '广阔天地'
      WHEN modename = '生存模式' THEN '隧道'
      ELSE '其他模式'
    END AS gameplay_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS daily_participate_users,
    COUNT(*) / COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS daily_avg_rounds
  FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
  WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240618' AND '20250330'
  GROUP BY dtstatdate, gameplay_name
),
daily_active_users AS (
  -- 每日总活跃用户数（所有平台）
  SELECT 
    dtstatdate,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS daily_active_users
  FROM dws_jordass_login_di
  WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240618' AND '20250330'
    AND platid = 255
  GROUP BY dtstatdate
),
daily_stats AS (
  -- 合并每日玩法数据和活跃用户数，计算自然周和参与率
  SELECT 
    m.dtstatdate,
    DATE_FORMAT(DATE_SUB(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(m.dtstatdate,'yyyyMMdd')), PMOD(DATEDIFF(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(m.dtstatdate,'yyyyMMdd')), '1900-01-03'), 7)), 'yyyyMMdd') AS natural_week,
    m.gameplay_name,
    m.daily_participate_users,
    m.daily_avg_rounds,
    a.daily_active_users,
    m.daily_participate_users / a.daily_active_users AS daily_participate_rate
  FROM daily_mode_stats m
  JOIN daily_active_users a ON m.dtstatdate = a.dtstatdate
)
SELECT 
  natural_week,
  gameplay_name,
  AVG(daily_participate_users) AS week_avg_daily_participate_users,
  AVG(daily_participate_rate) AS week_avg_daily_participate_rate,
  AVG(daily_avg_rounds) AS week_avg_daily_rounds
FROM daily_stats
GROUP BY natural_week, gameplay_name
ORDER BY natural_week, gameplay_name;

WITH platform_active AS (
    -- Step 1: 协作平台活跃用户
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dwd_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250217' AND '20250318'
),
non_coop_gameplay AS (
    -- Step 2: 排除在协作玩法活跃的用户（取交集）
    SELECT DISTINCT a.vplayerid
    FROM platform_active a
    WHERE NOT EXISTS (
        SELECT 1
        FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di b
        WHERE b.vplayerid = a.vplayerid
          AND b.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250217' AND '20250318'
          AND b.vtemp1 = '协作'
    )
),
mode_stats AS (
    -- Step 3: 计算目标用户在各玩法的对局次数
    SELECT 
        c.vplayerid,
        c.modename,
        COUNT(*) AS play_count,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY c.vplayerid ORDER BY COUNT(*) DESC) AS rn
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di c
    INNER JOIN non_coop_gameplay d ON c.vplayerid = d.vplayerid
    WHERE c.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250217' AND '20250318'
      AND c.modename IN ('传统模式','休闲模式','组队竞技','领地','乐园','广阔天地','创意创作间','生存模式')
    GROUP BY c.vplayerid, c.modename
)
-- Step 4: 统计主玩玩法分布
SELECT 
    modename AS 主玩玩法,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS 人数
FROM mode_stats
WHERE rn = 1  -- 只保留每个用户对局次数最多的玩法（主玩）
GROUP BY modename
ORDER BY 人数 DESC;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS participate_users,
    SUM(roundtime) / 60 AS duration_minutes
FROM 
    dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
WHERE 
    (dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230114' AND '20230128')
    OR (dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240202' AND '20240216')
    OR (dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250121' AND '20250204')
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 1, 6) AS month,
    -- 新进用户：当日活跃且注册日期在当月
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' 
        AND dregdate >= CONCAT(SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 1, 6), '01') 
        AND dregdate <= dtstatdate 
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS new_users,
    -- 回流用户：当日活跃、前一日不活跃、注册日期早于当月、历史有活跃
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' 
        AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 1) = '0' 
        AND dregdate < CONCAT(SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 1, 6), '01') 
        AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 99), '1') > 0
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS return_users,
    -- 轻度留存：当日活跃、前一日活跃、当月活跃1-4天
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' 
        AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 1) = '1' 
        AND LENGTH(REPLACE(
            SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, CAST(SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 7, 2) AS INT)), 
            '0', ''
        )) BETWEEN 1 AND 4
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS light_retention,
    -- 中度留存：当日活跃、前一日活跃、当月活跃5-15天
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' 
        AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 1) = '1' 
        AND LENGTH(REPLACE(
            SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, CAST(SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 7, 2) AS INT)), 
            '0', ''
        )) BETWEEN 5 AND 15
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS medium_retention,
    -- 重度留存：当日活跃、前一日活跃、当月活跃16天及以上
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1' 
        AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 1) = '1' 
        AND LENGTH(REPLACE(
            SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, CAST(SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 7, 2) AS INT)), 
            '0', ''
        )) >= 16
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS heavy_retention
FROM dws_jordass_login_df
WHERE dtstatdate IN ('20240331', '20240430', '20240531', '20240630')
  AND platid = 255
GROUP BY SUBSTR(dtstatdate, 1, 6)
ORDER BY month;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS player_count
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_di
WHERE 
    dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240103'
    AND platid = 255
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 日期,
    SPLIT(extarg2, '_')[1] AS extarg2_second_part,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count,
    COUNT(1) AS click_count
FROM 
    dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
WHERE 
    dtstatdate BETWEEN '20211101' AND '20211130'
    AND SPLIT(extarg2, '_')[1] IN ('8', '16', '17')
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate,
    SPLIT(extarg2, '_')[1]
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate,
    extarg2_second_part;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN '轻度'
        WHEN active_days BETWEEN 6 AND 15 THEN '中度'
        WHEN active_days >= 16 THEN '重度'
    END AS active_level,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS player_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtstatdate) AS active_days
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20250101' AND '20250131'
        AND platid = 255
    GROUP BY vplayerid
) t
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 5 THEN '轻度'
        WHEN active_days BETWEEN 6 AND 15 THEN '中度'
        WHEN active_days >= 16 THEN '重度'
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE active_level
        WHEN '轻度' THEN 1
        WHEN '中度' THEN 2
        WHEN '重度' THEN 3
    END;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN total_amount <= 12 THEN '小R'
        WHEN total_amount > 12 AND total_amount <= 60 THEN '中R'
        WHEN total_amount > 60 AND total_amount <= 180 THEN '大R'
        WHEN total_amount > 180 THEN '超R'
        ELSE '未知'
    END AS pay_level,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS pay_user_count,
    SUM(total_amount) AS total_pay_amount
FROM (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        SUM(imoney) / 100 AS total_amount
    FROM dws_jordass_water_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20241231'
    GROUP BY vplayerid
) t
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN total_amount <= 12 THEN '小R'
        WHEN total_amount > 12 AND total_amount <= 60 THEN '中R'
        WHEN total_amount > 60 AND total_amount <= 180 THEN '大R'
        WHEN total_amount > 180 THEN '超R'
        ELSE '未知'
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE pay_level
        WHEN '小R' THEN 1
        WHEN '中R' THEN 2
        WHEN '大R' THEN 3
        WHEN '超R' THEN 4
        ELSE 5
    END;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS lost_paying_users
FROM (
    -- 7-8月活跃的微信用户
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230701' AND '20230831'
      AND vgameappid = 'wx'
) a
INNER JOIN (
    -- 7-8月有付费的微信用户
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_water_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230701' AND '20230831'
      AND vgameappid = 'wx'
) b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid
WHERE a.vplayerid NOT IN (
    -- 9月1-21日活跃的微信用户（需排除）
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230901' AND '20230921'
      AND vgameappid = 'wx'
);

WITH 
-- 1. 获取按钮点击用户及类型
button_click AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        MAX(CASE WHEN buttontype = '400211' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_400211,
        MAX(CASE WHEN buttontype = '400212' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_400212
    FROM dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241031'
        AND buttontype IN ('400211', '400212')
    GROUP BY vplayerid
),
user_type_base AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN has_400211 = 1 AND has_400212 = 1 THEN '400211&400212'
            WHEN has_400211 = 1 THEN '400211'
            WHEN has_400212 = 1 THEN '400212'
            ELSE 'other'
        END AS user_type
    FROM button_click
),
-- 2. 获取玩家最新性别（假设从登录流水表获取，使用窗口函数）
latest_gender AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        gender,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY vplayerid ORDER BY tdbank_imp_date DESC) AS rn
    FROM dwd_jordass_playerlogin_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024100100' AND '2024103123'
),
gender_info AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN gender = 1 THEN 'male'
            WHEN gender = 2 THEN 'female'
            ELSE 'other'
        END AS gender_type
    FROM latest_gender
    WHERE rn = 1
),
-- 3. 统计砺刃游戏活跃天数
game_activity AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtstatdate) AS active_days
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241031'
    GROUP BY vplayerid
),
game_activity_level AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN 'light'
            WHEN active_days BETWEEN 5 AND 15 THEN 'medium'
            WHEN active_days >= 16 THEN 'heavy'
            ELSE 'other'
        END AS game_activity
    FROM game_activity
),
-- 4. 统计乐园活跃天数
park_activity AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtstatdate) AS active_days
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241031'
        AND imode = 255
    GROUP BY vplayerid
),
park_activity_level AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN 'light'
            WHEN active_days BETWEEN 5 AND 15 THEN 'medium'
            WHEN active_days >= 16 THEN 'heavy'
            ELSE 'other'
        END AS park_activity
    FROM park_activity
)
-- 5. 主查询：关联所有维度并统计
SELECT 
    ut.user_type,
    COALESCE(gi.gender_type, 'other') AS gender_type,
    COALESCE(pal.park_activity, 'other') AS park_activity,
    COALESCE(gal.game_activity, 'other') AS game_activity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ut.vplayerid) AS user_count
FROM user_type_base ut
LEFT JOIN gender_info gi ON ut.vplayerid = gi.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN park_activity_level pal ON ut.vplayerid = pal.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN game_activity_level gal ON ut.vplayerid = gal.vplayerid
GROUP BY 
    ut.user_type,
    COALESCE(gi.gender_type, 'other'),
    COALESCE(pal.park_activity, 'other'),
    COALESCE(gal.game_activity, 'other')
ORDER BY 
    ut.user_type,
    gender_type,
    park_activity,
    game_activity;

WITH base_data AS (
    SELECT 
        a.vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241108' AND '20241121' THEN '时间段1'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241122' AND '20241204' THEN '时间段1'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241110' AND '20241123' THEN '时间段2'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241124' AND '20241204' THEN '时间段2'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241115' AND '20241128' THEN '时间段3'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241129' AND '20241204' THEN '时间段3'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241117' AND '20241130' THEN '时间段4'
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241201' AND '20241204' THEN '时间段4'
        END AS time_segment,
        CASE 
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241108' AND '20241121' THEN 1
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241110' AND '20241123' THEN 1
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241115' AND '20241128' THEN 1
            WHEN a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241117' AND '20241130' THEN 1
            ELSE 2
        END AS period_flag
    FROM dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di a
    INNER JOIN dim_jordass_submodeonlinedate_conf b
        ON a.buttontype = b.matchsubmodegroup
    WHERE a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241108' AND '20241204'
        AND a.buttontype IS NOT NULL
),
user_participation AS (
    SELECT 
        time_segment,
        vplayerid,
        MAX(CASE WHEN period_flag = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_period1,
        MAX(CASE WHEN period_flag = 2 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS has_period2
    FROM base_data
    WHERE time_segment IS NOT NULL
    GROUP BY time_segment, vplayerid
)
SELECT 
    time_segment AS 时间段,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN has_period1 = 1 THEN vplayerid END) AS 第1个周期进入过灰度玩法的用户数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN has_period1 = 1 AND has_period2 = 1 THEN vplayerid END) AS 两个周期都进入过灰度的用户数
FROM user_participation
GROUP BY time_segment
ORDER BY time_segment;

WITH mode_total AS (
    -- 计算每个子玩法的总对局数
    SELECT 
        imode,
        SUM(icnt) AS total_matches
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241008'
        AND imode != 255
    GROUP BY imode
),
mode_with_rank AS (
    -- 计算排名和总数
    SELECT 
        imode,
        total_matches,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY total_matches DESC) AS rn,
        COUNT(*) OVER () AS total_modes
    FROM mode_total
),
bottom_20_modes AS (
    -- 筛选出后20%的子玩法
    SELECT imode
    FROM mode_with_rank
    WHERE rn > total_modes * 0.8
),
target_users AS (
    -- 找出参与了后20%子玩法的用户
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241008'
        AND imode IN (SELECT imode FROM bottom_20_modes)
),
daily_mode_count AS (
    -- 统计这些用户每天参与的子玩法数量
    SELECT 
        t1.dtstatdate,
        t1.vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT t1.imode) AS mode_count
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di t1
    INNER JOIN target_users t2 ON t1.vplayerid = t2.vplayerid
    WHERE t1.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241001' AND '20241008'
        AND t1.imode != 255
    GROUP BY t1.dtstatdate, t1.vplayerid
)
-- 最终统计：按日期和数量分布区间统计人数
SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    CASE 
        WHEN mode_count = 1 THEN '1'
        WHEN mode_count = 2 THEN '2'
        WHEN mode_count = 3 THEN '3'
        WHEN mode_count = 4 THEN '4'
        WHEN mode_count = 5 THEN '5'
        WHEN mode_count BETWEEN 6 AND 10 THEN '6-10'
        WHEN mode_count BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20'
        WHEN mode_count >= 21 THEN '21以上'
    END AS 数量分布,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS 人数
FROM daily_mode_count
GROUP BY dtstatdate, 
    CASE 
        WHEN mode_count = 1 THEN '1'
        WHEN mode_count = 2 THEN '2'
        WHEN mode_count = 3 THEN '3'
        WHEN mode_count = 4 THEN '4'
        WHEN mode_count = 5 THEN '5'
        WHEN mode_count BETWEEN 6 AND 10 THEN '6-10'
        WHEN mode_count BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20'
        WHEN mode_count >= 21 THEN '21以上'
    END
ORDER BY dtstatdate, 
    CASE 数量分布
        WHEN '1' THEN 1
        WHEN '2' THEN 2
        WHEN '3' THEN 3
        WHEN '4' THEN 4
        WHEN '5' THEN 5
        WHEN '6-10' THEN 6
        WHEN '11-20' THEN 11
        WHEN '21以上' THEN 21
    END;

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT `vplayerid`) AS return_users,
    SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 40, 7), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_8_14_days,
    SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 47, 15), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_15_29_days,
    SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 62, 30), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_30_59_days,
    SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 92, 120), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_60_179_days,
    SUM(CASE WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 212, 185), '1') > 0 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS active_180_364_days
FROM 
    `dws_jordass_login_df`
WHERE 
    `dtstatdate` = '20241121'
    AND `platid` = 255
    AND `dregdate` < '20241021'
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 32), '1') > 0
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 33, 7), '1') = 0;

WITH daily_play AS (
    SELECT 
        SUBSTR(a.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS play_date,
        a.vplayerid,
        a.matchmode,
        b.modename,
        b.startdate,
        b.enddate,
        LEAD(SUBSTR(a.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)) OVER (PARTITION BY a.vplayerid, a.matchmode ORDER BY SUBSTR(a.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)) AS next_play_date
    FROM dwd_jordass_player_matchrecord_hi a
    INNER JOIN dim_jordass_imode_leyuan_nf b
        ON a.matchmode = b.imode
        AND SUBSTR(a.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) BETWEEN b.startdate AND b.enddate
    WHERE a.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024092000' AND '2024102023'
        AND a.matchmode = 1003
        AND a.matchresult = '1'
),
daily_metrics AS (
    SELECT 
        modename,
        startdate,
        enddate,
        play_date,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS daily_users,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(play_date, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY) = STR_TO_DATE(next_play_date, '%Y%m%d')
            THEN vplayerid 
        END) AS daily_retention_users
    FROM daily_play
    GROUP BY modename, startdate, enddate, play_date
)
SELECT 
    modename AS 玩法,
    startdate AS 上线日期,
    enddate AS 下线日期,
    ROUND(AVG(daily_users), 2) AS 日均参与人数,
    ROUND(AVG(daily_retention_users), 2) AS 日均玩法次留
FROM daily_metrics
GROUP BY modename, startdate, enddate
ORDER BY modename;

WITH 
-- 第一步：获取每天每个玩法的基础指标
daily_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    m.dtstatdate,
    m.imode,
    d.matchsubmodegroupname,
    -- 当天参与人数
    COUNT(DISTINCT m.vplayerid) AS participate_users,
    -- 当天活跃人数（登录）
    COUNT(DISTINCT l.vplayerid) AS active_users,
    -- 当天参与率
    COUNT(DISTINCT m.vplayerid) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT l.vplayerid), 0) AS participation_rate
  FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di m
  INNER JOIN dws_jordass_login_di l
    ON m.dtstatdate = l.dtstatdate
    AND m.vgameappid = l.vgameappid
    AND m.vplayerid = l.vplayerid
    AND l.platid = 255
  INNER JOIN dim_jordass_submodeonline_nf d
    ON m.imode = d.matchsubmodegroup
  WHERE m.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241025' AND '20241130'
    AND m.platid = 255
    AND m.imode != 255
    AND d.onlinedate >= DATE_SUB(DATE_FORMAT(m.dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 180 DAY)
  GROUP BY m.dtstatdate, m.imode, d.matchsubmodegroupname
),

-- 第二步：计算次留和七留
retention_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    m1.dtstatdate,
    m1.imode,
    -- 次留：当天参与且次日也参与
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN m2.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN m1.vplayerid 
    END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT m1.vplayerid), 0) AS retention_d2,
    -- 七留：当天参与且第7天也参与
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
      WHEN m7.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN m1.vplayerid 
    END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT m1.vplayerid), 0) AS retention_d7
  FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di m1
  LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di m2
    ON m1.vgameappid = m2.vgameappid
    AND m1.vplayerid = m2.vplayerid
    AND m1.imode = m2.imode
    AND m2.dtstatdate = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(m1.dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    AND m2.platid = 255
    AND m2.imode != 255
  LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di m7
    ON m1.vgameappid = m7.vgameappid
    AND m1.vplayerid = m7.vplayerid
    AND m1.imode = m7.imode
    AND m7.dtstatdate = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(DATE_FORMAT(m1.dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), INTERVAL 7 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    AND m7.platid = 255
    AND m7.imode != 255
  WHERE m1.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241025' AND '20241130'
    AND m1.platid = 255
    AND m1.imode != 255
  GROUP BY m1.dtstatdate, m1.imode
),

-- 第三步：合并指标并计算7天移动平均
avg_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    dm.dtstatdate,
    dm.imode,
    dm.matchsubmodegroupname,
    -- 7天平均参与率
    AVG(dm.participation_rate) OVER (
      PARTITION BY dm.imode 
      ORDER BY dm.dtstatdate 
      ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
    ) AS avg_7d_participation_rate,
    -- 7天平均次留
    AVG(rm.retention_d2) OVER (
      PARTITION BY dm.imode 
      ORDER BY dm.dtstatdate 
      ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
    ) AS avg_7d_retention_d2,
    -- 7天平均七留
    AVG(rm.retention_d7) OVER (
      PARTITION BY dm.imode 
      ORDER BY dm.dtstatdate 
      ROWS BETWEEN 6 PRECEDING AND CURRENT ROW
    ) AS avg_7d_retention_d7
  FROM daily_metrics dm
  LEFT JOIN retention_metrics rm
    ON dm.dtstatdate = rm.dtstatdate
    AND dm.imode = rm.imode
),

-- 第四步：计算排名
ranked_metrics AS (
  SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    matchsubmodegroupname AS 玩法名,
    avg_7d_participation_rate,
    avg_7d_retention_d2,
    avg_7d_retention_d7,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY dtstatdate ORDER BY avg_7d_participation_rate DESC) AS 参与率排名,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY dtstatdate ORDER BY avg_7d_retention_d2 DESC) AS 次留排名,
    RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY dtstatdate ORDER BY avg_7d_retention_d7 DESC) AS 七留排名
  FROM avg_metrics
  WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241101' AND '20241130'  -- 只输出统计期内的数据
)

-- 第五步：计算总排名并输出
SELECT 
  统计日期,
  玩法名,
  参与率排名,
  次留排名,
  七留排名,
  (参与率排名 + 次留排名 + 七留排名) AS 总排名
FROM ranked_metrics
ORDER BY 统计日期, 总排名, 玩法名;

SELECT 
    `imode` AS 玩法id,
    CASE 
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 0 AND `itemp1`/60 < 10 THEN '[0-10min)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 10 AND `itemp1`/60 < 30 THEN '[10-30min)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 30 AND `itemp1`/60 < 60 THEN '[30min-1h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 60 AND `itemp1`/60 < 120 THEN '[1h,2h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 120 AND `itemp1`/60 < 180 THEN '[2h,3h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 180 AND `itemp1`/60 < 240 THEN '[3h,4h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 240 AND `itemp1`/60 < 300 THEN '[4h,5h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 300 AND `itemp1`/60 < 360 THEN '[5h,6h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 360 AND `itemp1`/60 < 420 THEN '[6h,7h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 420 AND `itemp1`/60 < 480 THEN '[7h,8h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 480 AND `itemp1`/60 < 540 THEN '[8h,9h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 540 AND `itemp1`/60 < 600 THEN '[9h,10h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 600 THEN '[10h,∞)'
    END AS 对局时长,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `vplayerid`) AS 人数
FROM `dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di`
WHERE (
    (`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20240717' AND '20240723' AND `imode` = 1310822585431254784)
    OR (`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20241116' AND '20241122' AND `imode` = 1282371711108385024)
    OR (`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20241123' AND '20241129' AND `imode` = 1287652322611036928)
    OR (`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20240301' AND '20240307' AND `imode` = 1294211358396518400)
    OR (`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20240607' AND '20240613' AND `imode` = 1297394991875754752)
)
GROUP BY 
    `imode`,
    CASE 
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 0 AND `itemp1`/60 < 10 THEN '[0-10min)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 10 AND `itemp1`/60 < 30 THEN '[10-30min)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 30 AND `itemp1`/60 < 60 THEN '[30min-1h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 60 AND `itemp1`/60 < 120 THEN '[1h,2h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 120 AND `itemp1`/60 < 180 THEN '[2h,3h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 180 AND `itemp1`/60 < 240 THEN '[3h,4h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 240 AND `itemp1`/60 < 300 THEN '[4h,5h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 300 AND `itemp1`/60 < 360 THEN '[5h,6h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 360 AND `itemp1`/60 < 420 THEN '[6h,7h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 420 AND `itemp1`/60 < 480 THEN '[7h,8h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 480 AND `itemp1`/60 < 540 THEN '[8h,9h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 540 AND `itemp1`/60 < 600 THEN '[9h,10h)'
        WHEN `itemp1`/60 >= 600 THEN '[10h,∞)'
    END
ORDER BY `imode`, 对局时长;

SELECT 
    dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN datediff(dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate, dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi.tdbank_imp_date) BETWEEN 0 AND 29 
        THEN dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi.uid 
    END) AS pay_user_count
FROM dws_jordass_water_di
INNER JOIN dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi
    ON dws_jordass_water_di.vplayerid = dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi.uid
WHERE dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate >= date_sub('20250226', 210) 
    AND dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate < '20250226'
    AND dws_jordass_water_di.platid = 255
    AND dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi.tdbank_imp_date >= date_sub('20250226', 180)
    AND dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi.tdbank_imp_date < '20250226'
GROUP BY dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate
ORDER BY dws_jordass_water_di.dtstatdate;

WITH 
-- 领奖玩家（活动参与者）
reward_players AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
  FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024020900' AND '2024020923'
    AND reason = 2402096612
    AND subreason BETWEEN 1 AND 7
    AND imoneytype = 1
),

-- 历史付费玩家标记
historical_payers AS (
  SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
  FROM dws_jordass_water_df
  WHERE dtstatdate <= '20240209'
),

-- 前一个月点券消耗金额（按玩家聚合）
prev_month_券 AS (
  SELECT 
    vplayerid,
    SUM(imoney) AS total_券消耗
  FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024010900' AND '2024020823'
    AND imoneytype = 1
    AND addorreduce = 1
  GROUP BY vplayerid
),

-- 首日付费数据（按玩家聚合）
first_day_pay AS (
  SELECT 
    vplayerid,
    SUM(imoney) AS total_券充值
  FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024020900' AND '2024020923'
    AND imoneytype = 1
    AND addorreduce = 0
  GROUP BY vplayerid
)

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN hp.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND pm.vplayerid IS NULL THEN '沉默付费'
    WHEN hp.vplayerid IS NULL THEN '历史非付费'
    WHEN pm.total_券消耗 / 10 < 100 THEN '小R'
    WHEN pm.total_券消耗 / 10 >= 100 AND pm.total_券消耗 / 10 < 500 THEN '中R'
    WHEN pm.total_券消耗 / 10 >= 500 AND pm.total_券消耗 / 10 < 1500 THEN '大R'
    WHEN pm.total_券消耗 / 10 >= 1500 THEN '超R'
    ELSE '未分类'
  END AS user_type,
  COUNT(DISTINCT rp.vplayerid) AS active_users,
  COUNT(DISTINCT fdp.vplayerid) AS first_day_payers,
  COALESCE(SUM(fdp.total_券充值) / 10.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT fdp.vplayerid), 0), 0) AS first_day_arpu,
  COUNT(DISTINCT pm.vplayerid) AS prev_month_券_users
FROM reward_players rp
LEFT JOIN historical_payers hp ON rp.vplayerid = hp.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN prev_month_券 pm ON rp.vplayerid = pm.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN first_day_pay fdp ON rp.vplayerid = fdp.vplayerid
GROUP BY user_type
ORDER BY 
  CASE user_type
    WHEN '沉默付费' THEN 1
    WHEN '历史非付费' THEN 2
    WHEN '小R' THEN 3
    WHEN '中R' THEN 4
    WHEN '大R' THEN 5
    WHEN '超R' THEN 6
    ELSE 7
  END;

WITH 
-- 角色DAU
role_dau AS (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS role_dau
  FROM dwd_jordass_playerlogin_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024083000' AND '2025022623'
    AND vgameappid = 'jordass'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
),
-- 联盟参与角色数
alliance_active AS (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS alliance_active_roles
  FROM dwd_jordass_player_allianceactive_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024083000' AND '2025022623'
    AND vgameappid = 'jordass'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
),
-- 联盟完成特训任务角色数
alliance_train AS (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT memberuid) AS alliance_train_complete_roles
  FROM dwd_jordass_alliancebootcamprecord_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024083000' AND '2025022623'
    AND vgameappid = 'jordass'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
),
-- 联盟商店兑换次数
alliance_shop AS (
  SELECT 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
    COUNT(1) AS alliance_shop_exchange_count
  FROM dwd_jordass_allianceshopbuy_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024083000' AND '2025022623'
    AND vgameappid = 'jordass'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE(d.stat_date, a.stat_date, t.stat_date, s.stat_date) AS stat_date,
  COALESCE(d.role_dau, 0) AS role_dau,
  COALESCE(a.alliance_active_roles, 0) AS alliance_active_roles,
  COALESCE(t.alliance_train_complete_roles, 0) AS alliance_train_complete_roles,
  COALESCE(s.alliance_shop_exchange_count, 0) AS alliance_shop_exchange_count
FROM role_dau d
FULL OUTER JOIN alliance_active a ON d.stat_date = a.stat_date
FULL OUTER JOIN alliance_train t ON COALESCE(d.stat_date, a.stat_date) = t.stat_date
FULL OUTER JOIN alliance_shop s ON COALESCE(d.stat_date, a.stat_date, t.stat_date) = s.stat_date
ORDER BY stat_date;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS UV,
    COUNT(1) AS PV
FROM 
    dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
WHERE 
    buttontype = '410012'
    AND (
        (dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241022' AND '20241119')
        OR (dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241122' AND '20241219')
    )
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    DATE_FORMAT(`dteventtime`, '%Y%m%d') AS stat_date,
    `awardidx` AS award_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `vplayerid`) AS user_count,
    COUNT(1) AS receive_count
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_activity_rewardrecord_hi
WHERE 
    `dteventtime` BETWEEN '2024-11-29 00:00:00' AND '2024-12-19 23:59:59'
    AND `actid` = 2411291018
    AND `acttype` = 10045
    AND `awardidx` IN (1, 2, 3)
GROUP BY 
    DATE_FORMAT(`dteventtime`, '%Y%m%d'),
    `awardidx`
ORDER BY 
    stat_date,
    award_type;

SELECT 
    igoodsid AS 道具id,
    COUNT(1) AS 产出次数
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_gearlog_hi
WHERE 
    tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2025012400' AND '2025020623'
    AND igoodsid IN (430487, 430485, 602004025, 602002011)
    AND addorreduce = 0
GROUP BY 
    igoodsid
ORDER BY 
    产出次数 DESC;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), 3, 6) AS date_yymmdd,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS player_count
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_lotteryrecord_hi
WHERE 
    tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2025012800' AND '2025021023'
    AND activitytype IN (848, 841)
GROUP BY 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
ORDER BY 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8);

SELECT 
    tdbank_imp_date AS `日期`,
    chattype AS `信息类型`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT playerid) AS `人数`,
    COUNT(1) AS `次数`
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_msgchatrecord_hi
WHERE 
    tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20241225' AND '20250105'
    AND chattype IN (20, 25, 26, 16, 27, 8)
GROUP BY 
    tdbank_imp_date,
    chattype
ORDER BY 
    tdbank_imp_date,
    chattype;

SELECT 
    CAST(awardidx AS STRING) AS awardidx,
    user_count
FROM (
    -- 各档位统计
    SELECT 
        awardidx,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count
    FROM dwd_jordass_activity_rewardrecord_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112900' AND '2024121923'
        AND actid = 2411291018
    GROUP BY awardidx
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 汇总统计
    SELECT 
        -1 AS awardidx,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count
    FROM dwd_jordass_activity_rewardrecord_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112900' AND '2024121923'
        AND actid = 2411291018
) t
ORDER BY 
    CASE WHEN awardidx = -1 THEN 999999 ELSE awardidx END;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112900' AND '2024120523' THEN '20241129-20241205'
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024120600' AND '2024121223' THEN '20241206-20241212'
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024121300' AND '2024121923' THEN '20241213-20241219'
    END AS date_range,
    extarg1,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count,
    COUNT(1) AS click_count
FROM dwd_jordass_activitypress_hi
WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112900' AND '2024121923'
    AND ireason = 2411291018
    AND buttontype = 10045
    AND extarg1 IN (101, 109, 110)
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112900' AND '2024120523' THEN '20241129-20241205'
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024120600' AND '2024121223' THEN '20241206-20241212'
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024121300' AND '2024121923' THEN '20241213-20241219'
    END,
    extarg1
ORDER BY date_range, extarg1;

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 THEN vplayerid END) AS 乐园总参与人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 THEN 1 END) AS 乐园总参与局数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND teamnum > 1 THEN vplayerid END) AS 乐园组队人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND teamnum > 1 THEN 1 END) AS 乐园组队局数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup = 1345785623905087744 THEN vplayerid END) AS 对决冠军总参与人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup = 1345785623905087744 THEN 1 END) AS 对决冠军总参与局数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup = 1345785623905087744 AND teamnum > 1 THEN vplayerid END) AS 对决冠军组队人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup = 1345785623905087744 AND teamnum > 1 THEN 1 END) AS 对决冠军组队局数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup <> 1345785623905087744 THEN vplayerid END) AS 乐园其他总参与人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup <> 1345785623905087744 THEN 1 END) AS 乐园其他总参与局数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup <> 1345785623905087744 AND teamnum > 1 THEN vplayerid END) AS 乐园其他组队人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN matchmode = 1003 AND matchsubmodegroup <> 1345785623905087744 AND teamnum > 1 THEN 1 END) AS 乐园其他组队局数
FROM dwd_jordass_player_matchrecord_hi
WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112300' AND '2024122223'
    AND matchresult = 'ok';

SELECT 
    buttontypes AS 按钮类型,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112305' AND '2024112616' 
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS SS30赛季手册人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024092405' AND '2024092716' 
        THEN vplayerid 
    END) AS SS29赛季手册人数
FROM dwd_jordass_pressbutton_hi
WHERE buttontypes IN ('411130', '411200')
    AND (
        tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024112305' AND '2024112616'
        OR tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024092405' AND '2024092716'
    )
GROUP BY buttontypes;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count,
    SUM(imoney) AS total_element_pay
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
WHERE 
    tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2023012300' AND '2023012923'
    AND reason IN (189, 190)
    AND imoneytype = 1027
GROUP BY 
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
ORDER BY 
    stat_date;

    FROM dwd_jordass_gearlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date >= '2024072600' 
      AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2024082223'
      AND igoodsid = 430225 
      AND addorreduce = 0
)

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_690.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&沙漠统治者有抽奖人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_748.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&境界双花有抽奖人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_750.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&玄龙凌霄有抽奖人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_690.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430179.vplayerid IS NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&沙漠统治者有抽奖&但没有其主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_748.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430265.vplayerid IS NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&境界双花有抽奖&但没有其主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_750.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430225.vplayerid IS NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&玄龙凌霄有抽奖&但没有其主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN gear_430179.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430265.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&沙漠统治者和境界双花有主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN gear_430179.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430225.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&沙漠统治者和玄龙凌霄有主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN gear_430265.vplayerid IS NOT NULL AND gear_430225.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖&境界双花和玄龙凌霄有主套人数`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN lottery_690.vplayerid IS NULL AND lottery_748.vplayerid IS NULL AND lottery_750.vplayerid IS NULL THEN lottery_815.vplayerid END) AS `初日华服回归抽奖但沙漠统治者&境界双花&玄龙凌霄没有抽奖人数`
FROM lottery_815
