LEFT JOIN lottery_748 ON lottery_815.vplayerid = lottery_748.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN lottery_750 ON lottery_815.vplayerid = lottery_750.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN gear_430179 ON lottery_815.vplayerid = gear_430179.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN gear_430265 ON lottery_815.vplayerid = gear_430265.vplayerid
LEFT JOIN gear_430225 ON lottery_815.vplayerid = gear_430225.vplayerid;

WITH base_data AS (
    -- 基础数据：添加周期标识和玩法分类
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        -- 计算周期编号（从2024-10-02开始，每7天一个周期）
        FLOOR(DATEDIFF(DATE_FORMAT(dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d'), '2024-10-02') / 7) AS week_num,
        CASE 
            WHEN modename='传统模式' AND submodename LIKE 'CG%' AND mapname='群屿' THEN '主题群屿'
            WHEN modename='传统模式' AND mapname='群屿' THEN '传统群屿'
            WHEN modename='传统模式' AND mapname='假日群岛' THEN '假日群岛'
            WHEN submodename='广域战场模式' THEN '广域战场'
            WHEN submodename='极能形态模式' THEN '极能形态'
            WHEN modename='组队竞技' THEN '组竞'
            WHEN modename='休闲模式' THEN '休闲'
            WHEN modename='乐园' THEN '乐园'
            WHEN modename='领地' THEN '领地'
            WHEN modename='广阔天地' THEN '广阔天地'
            WHEN modename='生存模式' THEN '隧道'
            ELSE '其他模式'
        END AS mode_category,
        CASE WHEN modename='乐园' AND submodename='对决冠军' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END AS is_champion,
        roundtime
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241002' AND '20250108'
),

-- 识别每周参与对决冠军的用户
champion_users AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT
        week_num,
        vplayerid
    FROM base_data
    WHERE is_champion = 1
),

-- 找出上周未参与但本周参与对决冠军的用户（每个周期对）
target_users AS (
    SELECT 
        curr.week_num AS curr_week,
        curr.vplayerid
    FROM champion_users curr
    LEFT JOIN champion_users prev 
        ON curr.vplayerid = prev.vplayerid 
        AND prev.week_num = curr.week_num - 1
    WHERE prev.vplayerid IS NULL  -- 上周未参与
        AND curr.week_num > 0  -- 排除第0周（无上周数据）
),

-- 计算每个用户每周每个玩法的时长
user_mode_playtime AS (
    SELECT 
        b.week_num,
        b.vplayerid,
        b.mode_category,
        SUM(b.roundtime) AS total_seconds,
        SUM(CASE WHEN b.is_champion = 1 THEN b.roundtime ELSE 0 END) AS champion_seconds
    FROM base_data b
    INNER JOIN target_users t 
        ON b.vplayerid = t.vplayerid 
        AND (b.week_num = t.curr_week OR b.week_num = t.curr_week - 1)
    GROUP BY b.week_num, b.vplayerid, b.mode_category
),

-- 确定每个用户每周的主玩玩法
main_mode AS (
    SELECT 
        week_num,
        vplayerid,
        mode_category AS main_mode,
        total_seconds,
        ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY week_num, vplayerid ORDER BY total_seconds DESC, mode_category) AS rn
    FROM user_mode_playtime
),

-- 汇总每个用户每周的统计数据
weekly_stats AS (
    SELECT 
        ump.week_num,
        ump.vplayerid,
        mm.main_mode,
        ROUND(SUM(ump.total_seconds) / 3600.0, 2) AS total_play_hours,
        ROUND(SUM(ump.champion_seconds) / 3600.0, 2) AS champion_hours,
        ROUND(MAX(CASE WHEN mm.rn = 1 THEN ump.total_seconds ELSE 0 END) / 3600.0, 2) AS main_mode_hours
    FROM user_mode_playtime ump
    LEFT JOIN main_mode mm 
        ON ump.week_num = mm.week_num 
        AND ump.vplayerid = mm.vplayerid 
        AND ump.mode_category = mm.main_mode
    GROUP BY ump.week_num, ump.vplayerid, mm.main_mode
)

-- 最终输出
SELECT 
    CONCAT(
        DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD('2024-10-02', INTERVAL (curr.week_num - 1) * 7 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d'),
        ' - ',
        DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD('2024-10-02', INTERVAL curr.week_num * 7 - 1 DAY), '%Y-%m-%d')
    ) AS time_range,
    prev.main_mode AS prev_main_mode,
    prev.total_play_hours AS prev_total_hours,
    curr.main_mode AS curr_main_mode,
    curr.total_play_hours AS curr_total_hours,
    curr.champion_hours AS curr_champion_hours
FROM target_users t
INNER JOIN weekly_stats curr 
    ON t.vplayerid = curr.vplayerid 
    AND t.curr_week = curr.week_num
INNER JOIN weekly_stats prev 
    ON t.vplayerid = prev.vplayerid 
    AND t.curr_week - 1 = prev.week_num
ORDER BY time_range, t.vplayerid;

SELECT 
    a.dtstatdate AS stat_date,
    '流失14天以上的回流用户' AS user_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS return_user_count,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.buttontype = '10370' THEN b.vplayerid END) AS gift_click_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.buttontype IN ('10373', '10374') THEN b.vplayerid END) AS lobby_return_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT c.vplayerid) AS paradise_match_users
FROM (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dtstatdate IN ('20240102', '20231219', '20231212', '20231205', '20231010', '20230919', '20230103', '20221220')
        AND platid = 255
        AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1'
        AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 14), '1') = 0
        AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 16, 85), '1') > 0
) a
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        buttontype
    FROM dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di
    WHERE dtstatdate IN ('20240102', '20231219', '20231212', '20231205', '20231010', '20230919', '20230103', '20221220')
        AND buttontype IN ('10370', '10373', '10374')
) b ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid
    FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di
    WHERE dtstatdate IN ('20240102', '20231219', '20231212', '20231205', '20231010', '20230919', '20230103', '20221220')
        AND imode = 255
) c ON a.vplayerid = c.vplayerid AND a.dtstatdate = c.dtstatdate
GROUP BY a.dtstatdate
ORDER BY a.dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(f.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 6) AS stat_month,
    SUM(l.friendcount) / COUNT(DISTINCT l.vplayerid) AS avg_online_friends
FROM dwd_jordass_friendlist_hi f
INNER JOIN dws_jordass_login_df l
    ON f.vplayerid = l.vplayerid
WHERE f.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2020090100' AND '2022043023'
    AND f.type = 2
    AND l.dtstatdate = '20241210'
    AND l.platid = 255
    AND l.dregdate BETWEEN '20180101' AND '20181231'
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') > 0
GROUP BY SUBSTR(f.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 6)
ORDER BY stat_month;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS 活跃人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN b.vplayerid END) AS 匹配人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.tournamentid > 0 THEN b.vplayerid END) AS 参加微赛事人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.tournamentid = 0 OR b.tournamentid IS NULL THEN b.vplayerid END) AS 未参加微赛事人数
FROM dws_jordass_login_di a
LEFT JOIN dwd_jordass_player_matchrecord_hi b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid
    AND a.dtstatdate = SUBSTR(b.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
    AND b.matchresult = 'ok'
    AND (
        (b.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2022050600' AND '2022050823')
        OR (b.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2022051300' AND '2022051523')
    )
WHERE a.platid = 255
    AND (
        (a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20220506' AND '20220508')
        OR (a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20220513' AND '20220515')
    )
GROUP BY a.dtstatdate
ORDER BY a.dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    a.dtstatdate AS stat_date,
    a.matchsubmodegroup AS sub_mode,
    CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(a.dtstatdate, a.dregdate) <= 6 THEN '新进'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '留存'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') = 0 THEN '回流'
    END AS user_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS user_count
FROM 
    dim_jordass_leyuan_participate_cdf_nf a
INNER JOIN 
    dws_jordass_login_df b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
    AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate IN ('20230702', '20230709')
    AND b.dtstatdate IN ('20230702', '20230709')
    AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') > 0
GROUP BY 
    a.dtstatdate,
    a.matchsubmodegroup,
    CASE 
        WHEN DATEDIFF(a.dtstatdate, a.dregdate) <= 6 THEN '新进'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '留存'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') = 0 THEN '回流'
    END
ORDER BY 
    a.dtstatdate,
    a.matchsubmodegroup,
    user_type;

WITH user_activity AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CONCAT(
            YEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(dtstatdate, 'yyyyMMdd'))), 
            '-W', 
            LPAD(WEEKOFYEAR(FROM_UNIXTIME(UNIX_TIMESTAMP(dtstatdate, 'yyyyMMdd'))), 2, '0')
        ) AS week_period,
        CASE 
            WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '群屿' AND submode IN (2557, 2558, 2559) THEN '主题群屿'
            WHEN modename = '传统模式' AND mapname = '群屿' THEN '群屿'
            WHEN modename = '传统模式' THEN '传统其他'
            ELSE modename 
        END AS mode_category,
        SUM(CASE WHEN dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230529' AND '20230627' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS season_end_days,
        SUM(CASE WHEN modename = '乐园' AND submode IN (1265972235155284992, 1278160113246405632) THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS vertical_mode_days,
        SUM(CASE WHEN NOT (modename = '乐园' AND submode IN (1265972235155284992, 1278160113246405632)) AND submode IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS other_mode_days
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230322' AND '20230627'
        AND modename IN ('传统模式', '休闲模式', '组队竞技', '领地', '乐园', '广阔天地', '创意创作间')
    GROUP BY vplayerid, week_period, mode_category
),
user_intensity_calc AS (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        week_period,
        mode_category,
        CASE 
            WHEN SUM(season_end_days) BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN '轻度'
            WHEN SUM(season_end_days) BETWEEN 5 AND 15 THEN '中度'
            WHEN SUM(season_end_days) BETWEEN 16 AND 30 THEN '重度'
            WHEN SUM(vertical_mode_days) > 0 AND SUM(other_mode_days) = 0 THEN '独占'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS user_intensity
    FROM user_activity
    GROUP BY vplayerid, week_period, mode_category
)
SELECT 
    u.week_period,
    u.user_intensity,
    u.mode_category,
    CASE 
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '1' THEN '青铜'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '2' THEN '白银'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '3' THEN '黄金'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '4' THEN '铂金'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '5' THEN '星钻'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '6' THEN '王冠'
        WHEN SUBSTR(CAST(p.seasonmaxsegment AS STRING), 1, 1) = '7' THEN '王牌'
        ELSE '未定段位'
    END AS segment_name,
    COUNT(DISTINCT u.vplayerid) AS player_count
FROM user_intensity_calc u
LEFT JOIN dwd_jordass_playerlogin_hi p ON u.vplayerid = p.vplayerid
WHERE u.user_intensity IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY u.week_period, u.user_intensity, u.mode_category, segment_name
ORDER BY u.week_period, u.user_intensity, u.mode_category, segment_name;

WITH vertical_users AS (
    -- 识别垂类独占用户（赛季末期20230529-20230627）
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN modename = '乐园' 
            AND submode IN (1265972235155284992, 1278160113246405632) 
            THEN dtstatdate 
        END) AS vertical_active_days,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
            WHEN NOT (modename = '乐园' AND submode IN (1265972235155284992, 1278160113246405632))
            AND modename IS NOT NULL
            THEN dtstatdate 
        END) AS other_mode_days
    FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230529' AND '20230627'
    GROUP BY vplayerid
    HAVING vertical_active_days > 0 AND other_mode_days = 0
),
user_activity_level AS (
    -- 为垂类独占用户分配活跃度等级
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN vertical_active_days BETWEEN 1 AND 4 THEN '轻度'
            WHEN vertical_active_days BETWEEN 5 AND 15 THEN '中度'
            WHEN vertical_active_days BETWEEN 16 AND 30 THEN '重度'
        END AS activity_level
    FROM vertical_users
),
weekly_stats AS (
    -- 计算每周的登录天数和垂类玩法参与情况
    SELECT 
        u.vplayerid,
        u.activity_level,
        CONCAT(YEAR(date_format(l.dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d')), '-W', WEEKOFYEAR(date_format(l.dtstatdate, '%Y-%m-%d'))) AS week_period,
        COUNT(DISTINCT l.dtstatdate) AS login_days,
        COUNT(DISTINCT m.dtstatdate) AS mode_play_days,
        COALESCE(SUM(m.roundcnt), 0) AS mode_round_count
    FROM user_activity_level u
    LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di l 
        ON u.vplayerid = l.vplayerid 
        AND l.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230322' AND '20230627'
        AND l.platid = 255
    LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di m 
        ON u.vplayerid = m.vplayerid 
        AND m.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230322' AND '20230627'
        AND m.modename = '乐园'
        AND m.submode IN (1265972235155284992, 1278160113246405632)
    GROUP BY u.vplayerid, u.activity_level, week_period
)
-- 最终输出：按周期、活跃度、登录天数分组统计
SELECT 
    week_period AS 周期,
    activity_level AS 活跃度,
    login_days AS 活跃天数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS 人数,
    SUM(mode_play_days) AS 垂类玩法参与天数,
    SUM(mode_round_count) AS 垂类玩法参与局数
FROM weekly_stats
WHERE activity_level IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY week_period, activity_level, login_days
ORDER BY week_period, activity_level, login_days;

WITH base_users AS (
    -- 获取截至2023.6.30的活跃用户，且在7.01-7.16未活跃的用户
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        cbitmap,
        CASE 
            -- 7天内活跃（第2-8位有1）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '7天内活跃'
            -- 14天内未活跃（第2-15位全0）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 14), '1') = 0 THEN '14天内未活跃'
            -- 30天内未活跃（第2-31位全0）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 30), '1') = 0 THEN '30天内未活跃'
            -- 60天内未活跃（第2-61位全0）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 60), '1') = 0 THEN '60天内未活跃'
            -- 90天内未活跃（第2-91位全0）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 90), '1') = 0 THEN '90天内未活跃'
            -- 180天内未活跃（bitmap只有100位，第2-100位全0）
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 99), '1') = 0 THEN '180天内未活跃'
            -- 360天内未活跃（同180天，因为bitmap限制）
            ELSE '360天内未活跃'
        END AS active_segment
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dtstatdate = '20230630'
        AND platid = 255
        AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 16), '1') = 0  -- 7.01-7.16未活跃（第2-17位全0）
),
bridge_players AS (
    -- 获取7.17-7.23玩桥梁争夺的用户
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dwd_jordass_player_matchrecord_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2023071700' AND '2023072323'
        AND matchsubmodegroup = 1310822585431254784
)
SELECT 
    b.active_segment AS 活跃分层,
    COUNT(DISTINCT p.vplayerid) AS 玩桥梁争夺人数
FROM base_users b
INNER JOIN bridge_players p ON b.vplayerid = p.vplayerid
GROUP BY b.active_segment
ORDER BY 
    CASE b.active_segment
        WHEN '360天内未活跃' THEN 1
        WHEN '180天内未活跃' THEN 2
        WHEN '90天内未活跃' THEN 3
        WHEN '60天内未活跃' THEN 4
        WHEN '30天内未活跃' THEN 5
        WHEN '14天内未活跃' THEN 6
        WHEN '7天内未活跃' THEN 7
        WHEN '7天内活跃' THEN 8
    END;

WITH base_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        dregdate,
        cbitmap
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dtstatdate IN ('20230718', '20230725')
        AND platid = 255
        AND substr(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1'
),
classified_users AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN dregdate = dtstatdate THEN '新进'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 2, 6), '1') > 0 THEN '7'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '14'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 15, 16), '1') > 0 THEN '30'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '60'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 61, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '90'
            WHEN dregdate < dtstatdate AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 91, 90), '1') > 0 THEN '180'
            ELSE NULL
        END AS retention_type
    FROM base_data
)
SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS `统计日期`,
    retention_type AS `类型`,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS `人数`
FROM classified_users
WHERE retention_type IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY dtstatdate, retention_type
ORDER BY dtstatdate, 
    CASE retention_type
        WHEN '新进' THEN 1
        WHEN '7' THEN 2
        WHEN '14' THEN 3
        WHEN '30' THEN 4
        WHEN '60' THEN 5
        WHEN '90' THEN 6
        WHEN '180' THEN 7
    END;

SELECT 
    t1.return_type AS 回流类型,
    CASE 
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '轻度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN '中度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 6 AND 7 THEN '重度'
        ELSE '流失'
    END AS 活跃情况,
    COUNT(DISTINCT t1.vplayerid) AS 人数
FROM (
    -- 识别上周回流用户
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN substr(cbitmap, 1, 7) = '0000000' 
                 AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 8, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '7天回流'
            WHEN substr(cbitmap, 1, 30) = '000000000000000000000000000000' 
                 AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 31, 70), '1') > 0 THEN '30天回流'
        END AS return_type
    FROM dws_jordass_login_df
    WHERE dtstatdate = '20230711'
        AND platid = 255
        AND (
            (substr(cbitmap, 1, 7) = '0000000' AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 8, 30), '1') > 0)
            OR (substr(cbitmap, 1, 30) = '000000000000000000000000000000' AND instr(substr(cbitmap, 31, 70), '1') > 0)
        )
) t1
LEFT JOIN (
    -- 统计本周活跃天数
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        COUNT(DISTINCT dtstatdate) AS login_days
    FROM dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230712' AND '20230718'
        AND platid = 255
    GROUP BY vplayerid
) t2 ON t1.vplayerid = t2.vplayerid
GROUP BY t1.return_type, 
    CASE 
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '轻度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN '中度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 6 AND 7 THEN '重度'
        ELSE '流失'
    END
ORDER BY t1.return_type, 
    CASE 
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 1 AND 2 THEN '轻度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 3 AND 5 THEN '中度'
        WHEN t2.login_days BETWEEN 6 AND 7 THEN '重度'
        ELSE '流失'
    END;

SELECT 
    SUBSTR(`dtstatdate`, 1, 6) AS month,
    CASE 
        WHEN `dwaterdate` >= CONCAT(SUBSTR(`dtstatdate`, 1, 6), '01') 
             AND `dwaterdate` <= `dtstatdate` THEN 1
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') > 0 THEN 2
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 31, 70), '1') > 0 THEN 3
    END AS pay_type,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `vplayerid`) AS user_count,
    ROUND(SUM(`imoney`) / 100, 2) AS pay_amount_yuan
FROM 
    dws_jordass_water_df
WHERE 
    `dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20240531'
    AND `platid` = 255
    AND (
        (`dwaterdate` >= CONCAT(SUBSTR(`dtstatdate`, 1, 6), '01') AND `dwaterdate` <= `dtstatdate`)
        OR INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') > 0
        OR (INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') = 0 AND INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 31, 70), '1') > 0)
    )
GROUP BY 
    SUBSTR(`dtstatdate`, 1, 6),
    CASE 
        WHEN `dwaterdate` >= CONCAT(SUBSTR(`dtstatdate`, 1, 6), '01') 
             AND `dwaterdate` <= `dtstatdate` THEN 1
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') > 0 THEN 2
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 30), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 31, 70), '1') > 0 THEN 3
    END
ORDER BY 
    month, pay_type;

SELECT 
    a.dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    CASE 
        WHEN a.device_type IN (1, 5) THEN '模拟器'
        WHEN a.device_type = 0 THEN '手机'
        ELSE '其他'
    END AS 设备类型,
    SUBSTR(c.dregdate, 1, 4) AS 注册年份,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS 使用设备的人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT b.vplayerid) AS 使用设备玩生存模式人数,
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT b.vplayerid) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid), 0), 4) AS 使用设备玩生存模式占总设备人数的比例,
    ROUND(SUM(CASE WHEN SUBSTR(c.cbitmap, 2, 1) = '1' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 / NULLIF(COUNT(DISTINCT b.vplayerid), 0), 4) AS 使用设备玩生存模式的次留率
FROM 
    dws_jordass_device_login_di a
LEFT JOIN 
    dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid
    AND a.vgameappid = b.vgameappid
    AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
    AND a.device_type = b.device_type
    AND b.modename = '生存模式'
    AND b.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241123' AND '20241128'
INNER JOIN 
    dws_jordass_login_df c
    ON a.vplayerid = c.vplayerid
    AND a.vgameappid = c.vgameappid
    AND c.dtstatdate = '20241128'
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20241123' AND '20241128'
GROUP BY 
    a.dtstatdate,
    a.device_type,
    SUBSTR(c.dregdate, 1, 4)
ORDER BY 
    a.dtstatdate,
    设备类型,
    注册年份;

SELECT 
    COUNT(DISTINCT t1.vplayerid) AS hidden_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS(
            SELECT 1 
            FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di t2 
            WHERE t2.vplayerid = t1.vplayerid 
                AND t2.imode = 1310822585431254784 
                AND t2.platid <> 255 
                AND t2.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230719' AND '20230725'
        ) THEN t1.vplayerid 
    END) AS hidden_and_bridge_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN EXISTS(
            SELECT 1 
            FROM dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di t3 
            WHERE t3.vplayerid = t1.vplayerid 
                AND t3.mode = 2370 
                AND t3.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230719' AND '20230725'
        ) THEN t1.vplayerid 
    END) AS hidden_and_stealth_mode_users
FROM dws_jordass_matchlog_stat_di t1
WHERE t1.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20230719' AND '20230725'
    AND t1.imode = 1307095884553538304
    AND t1.platid <> 255

SELECT 
    dtstatdate,
    user_type,
    user_count,
    login_count
FROM (
    -- 乐园高活跃用户
    SELECT 
        a.dtstatdate,
        '乐园高活' AS user_type,
        COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS user_count,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN b.ilogincount > 0 THEN a.vplayerid END) AS login_count
    FROM 
        dws_jordass_buttonpress_pre_di a
    LEFT JOIN 
        dws_jordass_login_di b
        ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
        AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
        AND b.platid = 255
        AND b.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240527' AND '20240616'
    WHERE 
        a.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240527' AND '20240616'
    GROUP BY 
        a.dtstatdate
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 砺刃高活跃用户
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate,
        '砺刃高活' AS user_type,
        COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS user_count,
        COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN ilogincount > 0 THEN vplayerid END) AS login_count
    FROM 
        dws_jordass_login_di
    WHERE 
        dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240527' AND '20240616'
        AND platid = 255
    GROUP BY 
        dtstatdate
) t
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate, 
    user_type;

SELECT
    submode AS 子玩法,
    pay_category AS 分类,
    pay_tier AS 付费分层,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS 人数
FROM (
    SELECT
        vplayerid,
        submode,
        CASE 
            WHEN submode IS NULL OR submode = '' THEN '砺刃' 
            ELSE '乐园' 
        END AS pay_category,
        SUM(amount / 10) AS pay_amount,
        CASE 
            WHEN SUM(amount / 10) >= 1 AND SUM(amount / 10) < 30 THEN '小R'
            WHEN SUM(amount / 10) >= 30 AND SUM(amount / 10) < 100 THEN '中小R'
            WHEN SUM(amount / 10) >= 100 AND SUM(amount / 10) < 500 THEN '中R'
            WHEN SUM(amount / 10) >= 500 AND SUM(amount / 10) < 1500 THEN '大R'
            WHEN SUM(amount / 10) >= 1500 THEN '超R'
            ELSE '未付费'
        END AS pay_tier
    FROM dwd_jordass_payrespond_hi
    WHERE dteventtime BETWEEN '2024-06-01 00:00:00' AND '2024-06-30 23:59:59'
        AND res = 'ok'
        AND (submode IS NOT NULL AND submode != '')
    GROUP BY vplayerid, submode
) t
GROUP BY submode, pay_category, pay_tier
ORDER BY 子玩法, 
    CASE pay_tier
        WHEN '小R' THEN 1
        WHEN '中小R' THEN 2
        WHEN '中R' THEN 3
        WHEN '大R' THEN 4
        WHEN '超R' THEN 5
        ELSE 6
    END;

WITH business_data AS (
  -- 手册
  SELECT 
    '手册' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(CASE WHEN imoneytype = 1 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
    AND reason IN (143, 144, 156, 158, 246, 269, 273)
    AND addorreduce = 1
    AND imoneytype = 1
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 元素
  SELECT 
    '元素' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(CASE WHEN imoneytype = 1027 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 1.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
    AND reason IN (189, 190)
    AND addorreduce = 1
    AND imoneytype = 1027
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 轮盘
  SELECT 
    '轮盘' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(costnum) * 10.0 AS money,
    SUM(lotteryround) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_lotteryrecord_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 限定抽取
  SELECT 
    '限定抽取' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(costnum) * 10.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_lotterylog_twostage_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 专属卡
  SELECT 
    '专属卡' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(moneycnt) * 10.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_privpackagelog_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 战备
  SELECT 
    '战备' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(1) * 1.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_marketpurchase_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
    AND itemid_1 IN (1515013, 1515020, 1515023, 1515060, 1515277, 1515279)
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
  
  UNION ALL
  
  -- 直购
  SELECT 
    '直购' AS itype,
    SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS dt,
    vplayerid,
    SUM(1) * 1.0 AS money,
    COUNT(*) AS icnt
  FROM dwd_jordass_marketpurchase_hi
  WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024032600' AND '2024052723'
    AND itemid_1 NOT IN (1515013, 1515020, 1515023, 1515060, 1515277, 1515279, 1515029, 1515120, 1515123, 1515122, 1515121)
  GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8), vplayerid
)

SELECT 
  b.dt AS `日期`,
  CASE 
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 8, 23), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '7日回流'
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 61, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '30日回流'
    WHEN l.dregdate BETWEEN '20240326' AND '20240527' THEN '新进玩家'
  END AS `玩家类型`,
  COUNT(DISTINCT l.vplayerid) AS `总人数`,
  SUM(b.money) AS `总付费`,
  COUNT(DISTINCT b.vplayerid) AS `总付费人数`,
  b.itype AS `商业化类型`,
  COUNT(DISTINCT b.vplayerid) AS `消耗人数`,
  SUM(b.icnt) AS `抽奖次数_购买次数`,
  SUM(b.money) AS `付费数`
FROM business_data b
INNER JOIN dws_jordass_login_df l
  ON b.vplayerid = l.vplayerid
  AND l.dtstatdate = '20240527'
  AND l.platid = 255
WHERE CASE 
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 8, 23), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '7日回流'
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 61, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '30日回流'
    WHEN l.dregdate BETWEEN '20240326' AND '20240527' THEN '新进玩家'
  END IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY 
  b.dt,
  CASE 
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 8, 23), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '7日回流'
    WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') > 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') = 0 
      AND INSTR(SUBSTR(l.cbitmap, 61, 30), '1') > 0 THEN '30日回流'
    WHEN l.dregdate BETWEEN '20240326' AND '20240527' THEN '新进玩家'
  END,
  b.itype
ORDER BY b.dt, `玩家类型`, b.itype;

SELECT 
    login.dtstatdate AS 统计日,
    CASE 
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '1' THEN '青铜'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '2' THEN '白银'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '3' THEN '黄金'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '4' THEN '铂金'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '5' THEN '星钻'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '6' THEN '王冠'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) >= '7' THEN '王牌'
        ELSE '无段位'
    END AS 本赛季最高段位,
    COUNT(DISTINCT login.vplayerid) AS 活跃用户数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mode.vplayerid) AS 统计日参与主题群屿玩法用户数,
    ROUND(COUNT(DISTINCT mode.vplayerid) * 1.0 / COUNT(DISTINCT login.vplayerid), 4) AS 参与率
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_di AS login
LEFT JOIN 
    dwd_jordass_playerlogin_hi AS player
    ON login.vplayerid = player.vplayerid
    AND login.dtstatdate = substr(player.tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
LEFT JOIN 
    dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di AS mode
    ON login.vplayerid = mode.vplayerid
    AND login.dtstatdate = mode.dtstatdate
    AND mode.modename = '传统模式'
    AND mode.submodename LIKE 'CG%'
WHERE 
    login.dtstatdate IN ('20240902', '20240903', '20250908', '20250909')
    AND login.platid = 255
GROUP BY 
    login.dtstatdate,
    CASE 
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '1' THEN '青铜'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '2' THEN '白银'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '3' THEN '黄金'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '4' THEN '铂金'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '5' THEN '星钻'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) = '6' THEN '王冠'
        WHEN substr(player.seasonmaxsegment, 1, 1) >= '7' THEN '王牌'
        ELSE '无段位'
    END
ORDER BY 
    login.dtstatdate,
    本赛季最高段位;

SELECT 
    a.tdbank_imp_date AS stat_date,
    a.productid,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS buy_users,
    SUM(a.money) AS buy_amount,
    SUM(a.goodsnum) AS buy_quantity,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE 
        WHEN b.dregdate = a.tdbank_imp_date THEN a.vplayerid 
        END) AS new_reg_users
FROM 
    dwd_jordass_directpaycommflow_hi a
LEFT JOIN 
    dws_jordass_login_df b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid 
    AND a.vgameappid = b.vgameappid
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250910'
WHERE 
    a.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '20250901' AND '20250910'
    AND a.op = 'take'
    AND a.opres = 'ok'
    AND a.productid IN ('package_6', 'package_18', 'outfit_pack', 'weapon_pack')
GROUP BY 
    a.tdbank_imp_date,
    a.productid
ORDER BY 
    a.tdbank_imp_date,
    a.productid;

WITH charge_data AS (
    SELECT 
        dtstatdate AS stat_date,
        SUM(imoney) AS recharge_amount
    FROM dws_jordass_water_di
    WHERE dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240101' AND '20250601'
    GROUP BY dtstatdate
),
consume_data AS (
    SELECT 
        SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS stat_date,
        SUM(imoney) AS consume_coin
    FROM dwd_jordass_currencylog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024010100' AND '2025060123'
        AND addorreduce = 1
        AND imoneytype = 1
    GROUP BY SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8)
)
SELECT 
    COALESCE(a.stat_date, b.stat_date) AS stat_date,
    COALESCE(a.recharge_amount, 0) AS recharge_amount,
    COALESCE(b.consume_coin, 0) AS consume_coin
FROM charge_data a
FULL OUTER JOIN consume_data b ON a.stat_date = b.stat_date
ORDER BY stat_date;

WITH 
-- 第一个时间段：2022.1.18-1.24
period1 AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dwd_jordass_activitypress_hi
    WHERE substr(dteventtime, 1, 10) BETWEEN '2022-01-18' AND '2022-01-24'
      AND buttontype = 99123
      AND ireason = 3
),
-- 第二个时间段：2021.10.19-12.20
period2 AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT vplayerid
    FROM dwd_jordass_activitypress_hi
    WHERE substr(dteventtime, 1, 10) BETWEEN '2021-10-19' AND '2021-12-20'
      AND buttontype = 99123
      AND ireason = 3
),
-- 交叉用户
cross_users AS (
    SELECT p1.vplayerid
    FROM period1 p1
    INNER JOIN period2 p2 ON p1.vplayerid = p2.vplayerid
)

SELECT 
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM period1) AS period1_users,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM period2) AS period2_users,
    (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cross_users) AS cross_users

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 
        THEN 'iweek'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 14), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 15, 14), '1') > 0 
        THEN 'doubleiweek'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0 
        THEN 'imonth'
        WHEN LENGTH(REPLACE(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '0', '')) < 3 
             AND LENGTH(REPLACE(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '0', '')) > 0 
        THEN '30dayxioayu3day'
    END AS type,
    b.iqq
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_df a
INNER JOIN 
    dim_mgamejp_tbplayerid2qq_nf b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.splayerid 
    AND b.sappid = 'jordass'
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate = '20250424'
    AND a.platid = 255
    AND (
        (INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 7), '1') = 0 
         AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0)
        OR 
        (INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 14), '1') = 0 
         AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 15, 14), '1') > 0)
        OR 
        (INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '1') = 0 
         AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 31, 30), '1') > 0)
        OR 
        (LENGTH(REPLACE(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '0', '')) < 3 
         AND LENGTH(REPLACE(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 30), '0', '')) > 0)
    );

WITH win_records AS (
    -- 传统模式胜利记录
    SELECT 
        uid,
        COUNT(*) AS win_count
    FROM dwd_jordass_roundflow_hi
    WHERE dteventtime >= '2025-04-24 00:00:00'
      AND dteventtime < '2025-05-09 00:00:00'
      AND mode IN (101, 102, 103, 401, 402, 403)
      AND teamrank = 1
    GROUP BY uid
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 休闲模式胜利记录
    SELECT 
        uid,
        COUNT(*) AS win_count
    FROM dwd_jordass_roundlog_funnymode_hi
    WHERE dteventtime >= '2025-04-24 00:00:00'
      AND dteventtime < '2025-05-09 00:00:00'
      AND mode IN (201, 202, 203, 601, 602, 603)
      AND teamrank = 1
    GROUP BY uid
),
user_total_wins AS (
    -- 汇总每个用户的总胜利数
    SELECT 
        uid,
        SUM(win_count) AS total_wins
    FROM win_records
    GROUP BY uid
)
SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN total_wins = 1 THEN '1'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 2 AND 10 THEN '2-10'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 21 AND 50 THEN '21-50'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 51 AND 80 THEN '51-80'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 81 AND 100 THEN '81-100'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 101 AND 200 THEN '101-200'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 201 AND 500 THEN '201-500'
        WHEN total_wins >= 501 THEN '501以上'
    END AS win_distribution,
    COUNT(DISTINCT uid) AS player_count
FROM user_total_wins
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN total_wins = 1 THEN '1'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 2 AND 10 THEN '2-10'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 11 AND 20 THEN '11-20'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 21 AND 50 THEN '21-50'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 51 AND 80 THEN '51-80'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 81 AND 100 THEN '81-100'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 101 AND 200 THEN '101-200'
        WHEN total_wins BETWEEN 201 AND 500 THEN '201-500'
        WHEN total_wins >= 501 THEN '501以上'
    END
ORDER BY 
    CASE win_distribution
        WHEN '1' THEN 1
        WHEN '2-10' THEN 2
        WHEN '11-20' THEN 3
        WHEN '21-50' THEN 4
        WHEN '51-80' THEN 5
        WHEN '81-100' THEN 6
        WHEN '101-200' THEN 7
        WHEN '201-500' THEN 8
        WHEN '501以上' THEN 9
    END;

SELECT 
    t0.dtstatdate AS stat_date,
    COUNT(DISTINCT t0.vplayerid) AS active_users,
    COUNT(DISTINCT t1.vplayerid) AS login_day2_retention,
    COUNT(DISTINCT t2.vplayerid) AS login_day3_retention,
    COUNT(DISTINCT t6.vplayerid) AS login_day7_retention,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a0.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN t1.vplayerid END) AS activity_day2_retention,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a0.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN t2.vplayerid END) AS activity_day3_retention,
    COUNT(DISTINCT CASE WHEN a0.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN t6.vplayerid END) AS activity_day7_retention
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_di t0
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di t1 
    ON t0.vplayerid = t1.vplayerid 
    AND t1.dtstatdate = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(t0.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 1 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    AND t1.platid = 255
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di t2 
    ON t0.vplayerid = t2.vplayerid 
    AND t2.dtstatdate = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(t0.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 2 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    AND t2.platid = 255
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di t6 
    ON t0.vplayerid = t6.vplayerid 
    AND t6.dtstatdate = DATE_FORMAT(DATE_ADD(STR_TO_DATE(t0.dtstatdate, '%Y%m%d'), INTERVAL 6 DAY), '%Y%m%d')
    AND t6.platid = 255
LEFT JOIN (
    SELECT DISTINCT 
        vplayerid,
        SUBSTR(tdbank_imp_date, 1, 8) AS activity_date
    FROM dwd_jordass_activity_rewardrecord_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2022041300' AND '2022042123'
        AND actid = 2201123904
) a0 
    ON t0.vplayerid = a0.vplayerid 
    AND t0.dtstatdate = a0.activity_date
WHERE 
    t0.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20220413' AND '20220421'
    AND t0.platid = 255
GROUP BY 
    t0.dtstatdate
ORDER BY 
    t0.dtstatdate;

SELECT 
    tdbank_imp_date AS stat_date,
    type_name,
    x,
    y,
    z,
    COUNT(1) AS cnt
FROM (
    -- 变身速行战士
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身速行战士' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(SwiftMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(SwiftMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(SwiftMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND SwiftMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND SwiftMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身隐形战士
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身隐形战士' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(StealthMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(StealthMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(StealthMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND StealthMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND StealthMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身钩链战士
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身钩链战士' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(GrappleMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(GrappleMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(GrappleMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND GrappleMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND GrappleMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身强能猎手
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身强能猎手' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(HeroMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(HeroMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(HeroMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND HeroMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND HeroMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身冰霜领主
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身冰霜领主' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(IceAdvMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(IceAdvMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(IceAdvMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND IceAdvMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND IceAdvMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身强化战士
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身强化战士' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(PowerAdvMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(PowerAdvMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(PowerAdvMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND PowerAdvMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND PowerAdvMorphInfo != ''
    
    UNION ALL
    
    -- 变身龙焰猎手
    SELECT 
        tdbank_imp_date,
        '变身龙焰猎手' AS type_name,
        ROUND(CAST(split(DragonHeroMorphInfo, ',')[3] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS x,
        ROUND(CAST(split(DragonHeroMorphInfo, ',')[4] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS y,
        ROUND(CAST(split(DragonHeroMorphInfo, ',')[5] AS DOUBLE), 1) AS z
    FROM dwd_jordass_vsteaminfectlog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date = '20220425'
      AND DragonHeroMorphInfo IS NOT NULL 
      AND DragonHeroMorphInfo != ''
) t
GROUP BY 
    tdbank_imp_date,
    type_name,
    x,
    y,
    z
ORDER BY 
    stat_date,
    type_name,
    cnt DESC;

SELECT

SELECT 
    vplayerid,
    COUNT(DISTINCT period_id) AS distinct_period_count
FROM (
    SELECT 
        vplayerid,
        CASE
            -- 新年竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2024020200' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2024020423' THEN '新年竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2024020900' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2024021123' THEN '新年竞赛杯_2'
            -- 明星竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023120800' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023121023' THEN '明星竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023121500' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023121723' THEN '明星竞赛杯_2'
            -- 众竞赛道
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023100600' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023100823' THEN '众竞赛道_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023092900' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023100123' THEN '众竞赛道_2'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023092200' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023092423' THEN '众竞赛道_3'
            -- 珍禽竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023072100' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023072323' THEN '珍禽竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023072800' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023073023' THEN '珍禽竞赛杯_2'
            -- 都会竞速
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023051900' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023061123' THEN '都会竞速_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023061600' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023062523' THEN '都会竞速_2'
            -- 寒域竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023050500' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023050723' THEN '寒域竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023051200' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023051423' THEN '寒域竞赛杯_2'
            -- 飞跃竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2023012100' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2023012723' THEN '飞跃竞赛杯_1'
            -- 联队竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022112500' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022112723' THEN '联队竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022120200' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022120423' THEN '联队竞赛杯_2'
            -- 职赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022081900' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022082123' THEN '职赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022082600' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022082823' THEN '职赛杯_2'
            -- 夏日假期竞赛杯
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022072200' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022072423' THEN '夏日假期竞赛杯_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022072900' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022073123' THEN '夏日假期竞赛杯_2'
            -- 众投竞赛（需要matchmode为1503或1603）
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022050600' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022050823' AND matchmode IN (1503, 1603) THEN '众投竞赛_1'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022051300' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022051523' AND matchmode IN (1503, 1603) THEN '众投竞赛_2'
            WHEN tdbank_imp_date >= '2022052000' AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2022052223' AND matchmode IN (1503, 1603) THEN '众投竞赛_3'
        END AS period_id
    FROM dwd_jordass_player_matchrecord_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date >= '2022050600' 
        AND tdbank_imp_date <= '2024021423'
) t
WHERE period_id IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY vplayerid
ORDER BY distinct_period_count DESC;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 90), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 91, 90), '1') > 0 
        THEN '近三个月流失'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 90), '1') > 0 
             AND (b.vplayerid IS NULL OR INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 1, 90), '1') = 0) 
        THEN '近三个月活跃但近三个月无付费'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.cbitmap, 1, 90), '1') > 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(b.cbitmap, 1, 90), '1') > 0 
        THEN '近三个月活跃且有付费'
        ELSE '其他'
    END AS user_type,
    a.historymaxsegment,
    CASE 
        WHEN b.imoney IS NULL OR b.imoney = 0 THEN '0'
        WHEN b.imoney > 0 AND b.imoney <= 1200 THEN '(0-1200]'
        WHEN b.imoney > 1200 AND b.imoney <= 6000 THEN '(1200-6000]'
        WHEN b.imoney > 6000 AND b.imoney <= 18000 THEN '(6000-18000]'
        WHEN b.imoney > 18000 THEN '(18000+]'
    END AS pay_tier,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS user_count
FROM dws_jordass_uid_login_df a
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_water_df b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid
    AND a.vgameappid = b.vgameappid
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250225'
    AND b.platid = 255
WHERE a.dtstatdate = '20250225'
    AND a.platid = 255
GROUP BY 
    user_type,
    a.historymaxsegment,
    pay_tier
ORDER BY 
    user_type,
    a.historymaxsegment,
    pay_tier;

sql:
WITH top30_users AS (
    SELECT 
        `vplayerid`,
        COUNT(DISTINCT `dtstatdate`) AS active_days
    FROM `dws_jordass_login_df`
    WHERE `dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20250331' AND '20250510'
        AND `platid` = 255
        AND SUBSTR(`cbitmap`, 1, 1) = '1'
    GROUP BY `vplayerid`
    ORDER BY active_days DESC
    LIMIT 30
),
user_return_detail AS (
    SELECT 
        a.`vplayerid`,
        a.`dtstatdate`,
        CASE 
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 2, 7), '1') = 0 
                AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 9, 7), '1') = 0 
                AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 16, 16), '1') = 0 
            THEN '活跃'
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 2, 7), '1') = 0 
                AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 9, 7), '1') > 0 
            THEN '7日回流'
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 2, 14), '1') = 0 
                AND INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 16, 16), '1') > 0 
            THEN '14日回流'
            WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 2, 30), '1') = 0 
            THEN '30日回流'
            ELSE '其他'
        END AS return_type
    FROM `dws_jordass_login_df` a
    INNER JOIN top30_users b ON a.`vplayerid` = b.`vplayerid`
    WHERE a.`dtstatdate` BETWEEN '20250331' AND '20250510'
        AND a.`platid` = 255
        AND SUBSTR(a.`cbitmap`, 1, 1) = '1'
)
SELECT 
    `return_type` AS 用户回流类型,
    COUNT(DISTINCT `vplayerid`) AS 人数
FROM user_return_detail
GROUP BY `return_type`
ORDER BY 
    CASE `return_type`
        WHEN '活跃' THEN 1
        WHEN '7日回流' THEN 2
        WHEN '14日回流' THEN 3
        WHEN '30日回流' THEN 4
        ELSE 5
    END;

WITH 
-- 曝光用户
exposure AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT suser
    FROM dwd_jordass_mysteryplaylog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024042600' AND '2024050523'
      AND iactid = '1193536'
      AND itype = '1'
),
-- 参与用户
participate AS (
    SELECT DISTINCT suser
    FROM dwd_jordass_mysteryplaylog_hi
    WHERE tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024042600' AND '2024050523'
      AND iactid = '1193536'
      AND itype IN ('10','200','201','202','203','204','31','32','33','34','35','702','703')
),
-- 合并曝光和参与用户，计算状态
user_base AS (
    SELECT 
        COALESCE(e.suser, p.suser) AS vplayerid,
        CASE 
            WHEN e.suser IS NOT NULL AND p.suser IS NULL THEN '曝光未参与'
            WHEN e.suser IS NOT NULL AND p.suser IS NOT NULL THEN '曝光且参与'
        END AS exposure_participate_status
    FROM exposure e
    FULL OUTER JOIN participate p ON e.suser = p.suser
)
SELECT 
    ub.exposure_participate_status AS 曝光参与情况,
    COUNT(DISTINCT ub.vplayerid) AS 人数,
    COUNT(DISTINCT mr.vplayerid) AS 传统模式人数,
    COALESCE(SUM(mr.roundcnt), 0) AS 传统模式对局数,
    COALESCE(SUM(mr.roundtime), 0) AS 传统模式对局时长,
    COUNT(DISTINCT login.vplayerid) AS 活跃人数,
    COALESCE(SUM(login.ionlinetime), 0) AS 活跃时长,
    COUNT(DISTINCT prof.vplayerid) AS 专业赛人数,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN prof.vplayerid IS NOT NULL THEN 1 END) AS 专业赛局数
FROM user_base ub
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_mode_roundrecord_di mr 
    ON ub.vplayerid = mr.vplayerid 
    AND mr.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240426' AND '20240505'
LEFT JOIN dws_jordass_login_di login 
    ON ub.vplayerid = login.vplayerid 
    AND login.dtstatdate BETWEEN '20240426' AND '20240505'
    AND login.platid = 255
LEFT JOIN dwd_jordass_playerprofstagechange_hi prof 
    ON ub.vplayerid = prof.vplayerid 
    AND prof.tdbank_imp_date BETWEEN '2024042600' AND '2024050523'
    AND prof.tournamentid = 30002
WHERE ub.exposure_participate_status IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY ub.exposure_participate_status
ORDER BY ub.exposure_participate_status;

SELECT 
    dtstatdate AS 统计日期,
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 15), '1') = 0 THEN '后续半个月未登录' 
        ELSE '后续半个月有登录' 
    END AS 后续半个月活跃类型,
    CASE 
        WHEN dregdate = dtstatdate THEN '新增'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '7日以内留存'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 7), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '7~14日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 14), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 15, 16), '1') > 0 THEN '14~30日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 30), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 31, 60), '1') > 0 THEN '30~90日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 90), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 91, 10), '1') > 0 THEN '90日以上回流'
        ELSE NULL
    END AS 用户类型,
    COUNT(DISTINCT vplayerid) AS 人数
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_df
WHERE 
    dtstatdate IN ('20250429', '20250601')
    AND platid = 255
    AND SUBSTR(cbitmap, 1, 1) = '1'
GROUP BY 
    dtstatdate,
    CASE 
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 15), '1') = 0 THEN '后续半个月未登录' 
        ELSE '后续半个月有登录' 
    END,
    CASE 
        WHEN dregdate = dtstatdate THEN '新增'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '7日以内留存'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 7), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 8, 7), '1') > 0 THEN '7~14日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 14), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 15, 16), '1') > 0 THEN '14~30日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 30), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 31, 60), '1') > 0 THEN '30~90日回流'
        WHEN INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 2, 90), '1') = 0 
             AND INSTR(SUBSTR(cbitmap, 91, 10), '1') > 0 THEN '90日以上回流'
        ELSE NULL
    END
ORDER BY 
    dtstatdate,
    后续半个月活跃类型,
    用户类型;

SELECT 
    CASE 
        WHEN substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '11' THEN '7月24~7月25日持续活跃'
        WHEN substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '01' THEN '7.24活跃7.25流失到盘外'
    END AS user_type,
    b.gender AS gender,
    COUNT(DISTINCT a.vplayerid) AS user_count
FROM 
    dws_jordass_login_df a
INNER JOIN 
    dws_jordass_uid_login_df b
    ON a.vplayerid = b.vplayerid
    AND a.dtstatdate = b.dtstatdate
    AND a.vgameappid = b.vgameappid
    AND a.platid = b.platid
WHERE 
    a.dtstatdate = '20250725'
    AND a.platid = 255
    AND a.vgameappid = 'qq'
    AND b.dtstatdate = '20250725'
    AND (substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '11' OR substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '01')
GROUP BY 
    CASE 
        WHEN substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '11' THEN '7月24~7月25日持续活跃'
        WHEN substr(a.cbitmap, 1, 2) = '01' THEN '7.24活跃7.25流失到盘外'
    END,
    b.gender
ORDER BY 
    user_type, gender;
